trans-unit.source: When too many table locks have been set by write statements, some pending SELECTs are executed. The maximum number of write locks that can be acquired before this happens is determined by the max_write_lock_count server system variable, which is dynamic.
trans-unit.target: 当write语句设置了太多表锁时，将执行一些挂起的SELECT。在此之前可以获取的最大写锁定数由max_write_lock_count服务器系统变量确定，该变量是动态的。

trans-unit.source: When true, indexes are saved in separate files.
trans-unit.target: 当为 "true "时,索引将保存在单独的文件中。

trans-unit.source: When trying to execute an operation which is not allowed for the transaction's current state, an error is produced:
trans-unit.target: 当试图执行一个不允许交易当前状态的操作时,会产生一个错误。

trans-unit.source: When two arguments are given, COALESCE() is the same as IFNULL():
trans-unit.target: 给定两个参数时，COALESCE（）与IFNULL（）相同：

trans-unit.source: When two processes execute the same query, only the last process stores the query result. All other processes increase the Qcache_not_cached status variable.
trans-unit.target: 当两个进程执行相同的查询时，只有最后一个进程存储查询结果。所有其他进程都会增加Qcache_not_cached状态变量。

trans-unit.source: When upgrading between different major versions of MariaDB or MySQL you need to run the mysql_upgrade program to convert data that are incompatible between versions. This will also update your privilege tables in the mysql database to the latest format.
trans-unit.target: 在不同主要版本的MariaDB或MySQL之间进行升级时，您需要运行mysql_upgrade程序以转换版本之间不兼容的数据。这还将把您在mysql数据库中的特权表更新为最新格式。

trans-unit.source: When used in a query, the table returns the same file information listing than the system "DIR *.cc" statement would return if executed in the same current directory (here supposedly ..\)
trans-unit.target: 当在查询中使用该表时，该表返回的文件信息列表与如果在同一当前目录（此处假定为.. \）中执行的系统“ DIR *.cc ”语句将返回的信息相同。

trans-unit.source: When used in row comparisons these two queries are synonymous and return the same results:
trans-unit.target: 当用于行比较时,这两个查询是同义的,并返回相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: When used in row comparisons these two queries return the same results:
trans-unit.target: 当用于行比较时,这两个查询的结果是一样的。

trans-unit.source: When used with partitioned tables, TRUNCATE TABLE preserves the partitioning; that is, the data and index files are dropped and re-created, while the partition definitions (.par) file is unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 与分区表一起使用时， TRUNCATE TABLE 保留分区；也就是说，数据和索引文件将被删除并重新创建，而分区定义（.par）文件不受影响。

trans-unit.source: When using ALTER TABLE to change a column's character set, you need to ensure the character sets are compatible with your data. MariaDB will map the data as best it can, but it's possible to lose data if care is not taken.
trans-unit.target: 使用ALTER TABLE更改列的字符集时，需要确保这些字符集与您的数据兼容。MariaDB将尽最大可能映射数据，但是如果不注意，可能会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: When using row-based replication, the value of the slave_type_conversions variable is important. The default value of this variable is empty, in which case MariaDB will not perform attribute promotion or demotion. If the column definitions do not match, replication will stop. If set to ALL_NON_LOSSY, safe replication is permitted. If set to ALL_LOSSY as well, replication will be permitted even if data loss takes place.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于行的复制时，slave_type_conversions变量的值很重要。此变量的默认值为空，在这种情况下，MariaDB将不执行属性提升或降级。如果列定义不匹配，复制将停止。如果设置为 ALL_NON_LOSSY ，则允许安全复制。如果还设置为 ALL_LOSSY ，即使发生数据丢失，也将允许复制。

trans-unit.source: When using statement-based replication, generally, if a statement can run successfully on the slave, it will be replicated. If a column definition is the same or a larger type on the slave than on the master, it can replicate successfully. For example a column defined as VARCHAR(10) will successfully be replicated on a slave with a definition of VARCHAR(12).
trans-unit.target: 使用基于语句的复制时，通常，如果一条语句可以在从属服务器上成功运行，它将被复制。如果从属服务器上的列定义与主服务器上的列定义相同或更大，则可以成功复制。例如，定义为 VARCHAR(10) 的列将成功复制到具有 VARCHAR(12) 定义的从属服务器上。

trans-unit.source: When using EXPLAIN, if index_merge is the plan chosen by the optimizer, it will show up in the "type" column. For example:
trans-unit.target: 使用EXPLAIN时，如果 index_merge 是优化程序选择的计划，它将显示在“类型”列中。例如：

trans-unit.source: When using Galera Cluster with sysVinit, the first node in a cluster has to be started with service mysql bootstrap. See Getting Started with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Bootstrapping a New Cluster for more information.
trans-unit.target: 将Galera Cluster与sysVinit结合使用时，必须使用 service mysql bootstrap 启动集群中的第一个节点。有关更多信息，请参见MariaDB Galera Cluster入门：引导新集群。

trans-unit.source: When using Galera Cluster with systemd, a node's position in the cluster can be recovered with galera_recovery. See Getting Started with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Determining the Most Advanced Node for more information.
trans-unit.target: 将Galera Cluster与systemd一起使用时，可以使用 galera_recovery 恢复群集中节点的位置。有关更多信息，请参见MariaDB Galera Cluster入门：确定最高级的节点。

trans-unit.source: When using Galera Cluster with systemd, the first node in a cluster has to be started with galera_new_cluster. See Getting Started with MariaDB Galera Cluster: Bootstrapping a New Cluster for more information.
trans-unit.target: 将Galera Cluster与systemd一起使用时，必须使用 galera_new_cluster 启动集群中的第一个节点。有关更多信息，请参见MariaDB Galera Cluster入门：引导新集群。

trans-unit.source: When using multi-source replication, the same GTID position is shared by all slave connections. In this case, different masters should use different replication domains by configuring different gtid_domain_id values. If one master were using a gtid_domain_id value of 1, and if another master were using a gtid_domain_id value of 2, then any slaves replicating from both masters would have GTIDs with both gtid_domain_id values in gtid_slave_pos.
trans-unit.target: 使用多源复制时，所有从属连接共享相同的GTID位置。在这种情况下，不同的主服务器应通过配置不同的 gtid_domain_id 值来使用不同的复制域。如果一个主服务器使用的 gtid_domain_id 值为 1 ，并且另一个主服务器使用的 gtid_domain_id 值为 2 ，则从这两个主服务器复制的任何从服务器都将在GTid_slave_pos中具有两个 gtid_domain_id 值的 gtid_slave_pos 。

trans-unit.source: When using --verbose, aria_s3_copy will write a dot for each #/79 part of the file copied.
trans-unit.target: 使用 --verbose 时， aria_s3_copy 将为复制的文件的每个＃/ 79部分写入一个点。

trans-unit.source: When using DEFAULT as a value to set in an INSERT or UPDATE statement, you can use the bare keyword DEFAULT without the parentheses and argument to refer to the column in context. You can only use DEFAULT as a bare keyword if you are using it alone without a surrounding expression or function.
trans-unit.target: 在将 DEFAULT 用作在 INSERT 或 UPDATE 语句中设置的值时，可以使用裸关键字 DEFAULT (不带括号和参数）来引用上下文中的列。仅当单独使用 DEFAULT 而不使用周围的表达式或函数时，才可以将DEFAULT用作裸关键字。

trans-unit.source: When using NEXT VALUE the value will be reserved at once and will not be reused, except if the SEQUENCE was created with CYCLE. This means that when you are using SEQUENCEs you have to expect gaps in the generated sequence numbers.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 NEXT VALUE 时,该值将立即保留，并且不会重复使用，除非 SEQUENCE 是使用 CYCLE 创建的。这意味着，当您使用 SEQUENCE 时,您必须期望所生成的序列号之间存在间隔。

trans-unit.source: When using PAGE format (default) row data is cached by page cache.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 PAGE 格式（默认）时，行缓存由页面缓存缓存。

trans-unit.source: When using START SLAVE UNTIL master_gtid_pos = XXX, if the UNTIL position is present in the master's binlog then it is permissible for the start position to be missing on the master. In this case, replication for the associated domains stop immediately.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 START SLAVE UNTIL master_gtid_pos = XXX ，如果在主机的二进制日志中存在UNTIL位置，则允许在主机上丢失起始位置。在这种情况下，关联域的复制将立即停止。

trans-unit.source: When using master_use_gtid=current_pos there is no need to consider whether a server was a master or a slave prior to using CHANGE MASTER. But care must be taken not to inject extra transactions into the binlog on the slave server that are not intended to be replicated to other servers. If such an extra transaction is the most recent when the slave starts, it will be used as the starting point of replication. This will probably fail because that transaction is not present on the master. To avoid local changes on a slave server to go into the binlog, set sql_log_bin to 0.
trans-unit.target: 使用 master_use_gtid=current_pos 时，在使用CHANGE MASTER之前无需考虑服务器是主机还是从机。但是必须注意不要将多余的事务注入到从属服务器上的binlog中，这些事务不打算复制到其他服务器上。如果这种额外的事务是从属服务器启动时最新的事务，则它将用作复制的起点。这可能会失败，因为该事务不在主服务器上。为了避免从属服务器上的本地更改进入binlog，请将sql_log_bin设置为0。

trans-unit.source: When using mysqld_safe, if you would like to enable core dumps, the system's core file size limit can be changed by providing the --core-file-size option either on the command-line or in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 mysqld_safe 时，如果要启用核心转储，可以通过在命令行或选项文件中提供 --core-file-size 选项来更改系统的核心文件大小限制。例如：

trans-unit.source: When using mysqld_safe, if you would like to redirect the error log to the syslog, then that can easily be done by using the --syslog option. mysqld_safe redirects two types of log messages to the syslog--its own log messages, and log messages for mysqld.
trans-unit.target: 使用 mysqld_safe 时，如果要将错误日志重定向到syslog，则可以使用 --syslog 选项轻松完成。 mysqld_safe 将两种类型的日志消息重定向到syslog：它自己的日志消息和 mysqld 的日志消息。

trans-unit.source: When using mysqld_safe, the system's open files limit can be changed by providing the --open-files-limit option either on the command-line or in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 mysqld_safe 时，可以通过在命令行或选项文件中提供 --open-files-limit 选项来更改系统的打开文件限制。例如：

trans-unit.source: When using query_cache_type=DEMAND (after MDEV-6631 feature request) and the query specifies SQL_CACHE, the server will cache the query.
trans-unit.target: 当使用query_cache_type query_cache_type=DEMAND （在MDEV-6631功能请求之后）并且查询指定 SQL_CACHE 时，服务器将缓存查询。

trans-unit.source: When using query_cache_type=ON, and the query specifies SQL_NO_CACHE (case-insensitive), the server will not cache the query and will not fetch results from the query cache.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 query_cache_type=ON 且查询指定 SQL_NO_CACHE （不区分大小写）时，服务器将不会缓存查询，也不会从查询缓存中获取结果。

trans-unit.source: When using row_format=PAGE, (the default), Aria first writes the row, then the keys, at which point the check for duplicate keys happens. This makes PAGE format slower than DYNAMIC (or MyISAM) if there is a lot of duplicated keys because of the overhead of writing and removing the row. If this is a problem, you can use row_format=DYNAMIC to get same behavior as MyISAM.
trans-unit.target: 使用 row_format=PAGE 时（默认设置），Aria首先写入行，然后写入密钥，此时将检查重复的密钥。这使得 PAGE 格式慢 DYNAMIC （或MyISAM数据），如果有很多，因为写入和删除的行的开销的重复键。如果这是一个问题，则可以使用 row_format=DYNAMIC 来获得与MyISAM相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: When using sql_mode=ORACLE, table%ROWTYPE and cursor%ROWTYPE variables can be used as SELECT...INTO targets.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 sql_mode=ORACLE 时， table%ROWTYPE 和 cursor%ROWTYPE 变量可用作 SELECT...INTO 目标。

trans-unit.source: When using systemd, if you would like to enable core dumps, rather than setting the core file size by setting the core-file-size option for mysqld_safe, the limit can be changed by configuring the LimitCORE option for the MariaDB systemd service. For example, you can reconfigure the MariaDB systemd service to have an infinite size for core files by executing the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 使用 systemd 时，如果要启用核心转储，而不是通过为 mysqld_safe 设置 core-file-size 选项来设置核心文件大小，则可以通过为MariaDB systemd 服务配置 LimitCORE 选项来更改限制。例如，您可以通过执行以下命令，将MariaDB systemd 服务重新配置为具有无限大小的核心文件：

trans-unit.source: When using systemd, if you would like to redirect the error log to the syslog, then that can easily be done by doing the following:
trans-unit.target: 使用 systemd 时，如果要将错误日志重定向到syslog，则可以通过执行以下操作轻松完成：

trans-unit.source: When using systemd, rather than setting the open files limit by setting the open-files-limit option for mysqld_safe or the open_files_limit system variable, the limit can be changed by configuring the LimitNOFILE option for the MariaDB systemd service.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 systemd 时，可以通过为MariaDB systemd 服务配置 LimitNOFILE 选项来更改限制，而不是通过为 mysqld_safe 或 open_files_limit 系统变量设置 open-files-limit 选项来设置打开文件限制。

trans-unit.source: When using systemd, the umask of mysqld can be set by setting the UMASK and UMASK_DIR environment variables for the systemd service. For example, you can configure the MariaDB systemd service's umask by executing the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 当使用 systemd ，的的umask mysqld 可以通过设置来设定 UMASK 和 UMASK_DIR 环境变量来 systemd 服务。例如，您可以通过执行以下命令来配置MariaDB systemd 服务的umask：

trans-unit.source: When using A as the left table we ensure that the query will return at least as many rows as there are in that table. For rows where the join condition (B.id = A.id) is not met the selected column (A.colA) will still contain its original value. The not seen B.* row would contain all NULL:s.
trans-unit.target: 当使用A作为左表时,我们确保查询至少会返回与该表中的行数相同的记录。对于连接条件(B.id=A.id)不满足的行,所选列(A.colA)仍将包含其原始值。未见B.*行将包含所有的NULL:s。

trans-unit.source: When using ANALYZE TABLE (--analyze), uses the PERSISTENT FOR ALL option, which forces Engine-independent Statistics for this table to be updated. Added in MariaDB 10.1.10
trans-unit.target: 使用ANALYZE TABLE（-- --analyze ）时，使用PERSISTENT FOR ALL选项，该选项将强制更新此表的独立于引擎的统计信息。在MariaDB 10.1.10中添加

trans-unit.source: When using ColumnStore, MariaDB Server creates a series of system databases used for operational purposes.
trans-unit.target: 使用ColumnStore时,MariaDB服务器会创建一系列用于操作目的的系统数据库。

trans-unit.source: When using ColumnStore, MariaDB Server creates a series of system databases...
trans-unit.target: 当使用ColumnStore时,MariaDB服务器会创建一系列的系统数据库......。

trans-unit.source: When using GTID, @@sql_slave_skip_counter can not be used. Instead, setting @@gtid_slave_pos explicitly can be used to skip to after a given GTID position.
trans-unit.target: 当使用GTID时,不能使用@@sql_slave_skip_counter。取而代之的是,设置@@gtid_slave_pos显式可以用来跳转到一个给定的GTID位置之后。

trans-unit.source: When using Galera cluster, replication filters should be used with caution. See Configuring MariaDB Galera Cluster: Replication Filters for more details.
trans-unit.target: 使用Galera群集时，应谨慎使用复制过滤器。有关更多详细信息，请参阅配置MariaDB Galera群集：复制过滤器。

trans-unit.source: When using InnoDB FULLTEXT index one should not use innodb_defragment
trans-unit.target: 当使用InnoDB FULLTEXT索引时,不应该使用innodb_defragment。

trans-unit.source: When using LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE with the mcsmysql utility , use the --local-infile command-line option.
trans-unit.target: 在mcsmysql实用程序中使用LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE时，请使用--local-infile命令行选项。

trans-unit.source: When using MRR and BKA (and you do so with network storage), when Spider needs to create temporary tables on the backends, use the CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES privilege. Spider can still switch to a lower performance solution using spider_bka_mode=2, or Query push down or range predicate using spider_bka_mode=0
trans-unit.target: 当使用MRR和BKA（并且使用网络存储）时，Spider需要在后端上创建临时表时，请使用CREATE TEMPORARY TABLES特权。Spider仍可以使用spider_bka_mode = 2切换到性能较低的解决方案，或者使用spider_bka_mode = 0来查询下推或范围谓词

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup from versions prior to MariaDB 10.2.10, you would also have to remove any pre-existing InnoDB redo log files. For example:
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.10之前的版本中使用Mariabackup时，您还必须删除任何现有的InnoDB重做日志文件。例如：

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup to perform an incremental backup, this option forces it to also perform a full scan of the data pages being backed up, even when there's bitmap data on the changes. MariaDB 10.2 and later does not support changed page bitmaps, so this option is useless in those versions. See MDEV-18985 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mariabackup执行增量备份时，即使更改中有位图数据，此选项也会强制其也对要备份的数据页执行完整扫描。MariaDB 10.2和更高版本不支持更改的页面位图，因此此选项在那些版本中无用。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-18985。

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup with the --copy-back or --move-back command options, they normally require a non-empty target directory to avoid conflicts. Using this option with either of command allows Mariabackup to use a non-empty directory.
trans-unit.target: 将Mariabackup与 --copy-back 或 --move-back 命令选项一起使用时，它们通常需要一个非空的目标目录，以避免冲突。将此命令与任何一个命令一起使用允许Mariabackup使用非空目录。

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup, you don't necessarily need to restore every table and/or partition that was backed up. Even if you're starting from a full backup, it is certainly possible to restore only certain tables and/or partitions from the backup, as long as the table or partition involved is in an InnoDB file-per-table tablespace. This page documents how to restore individual tables and partitions.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mariabackup时，您不必还原所有备份的表和/或分区。即使您从完整备份开始，只要涉及的表或分区位于InnoDB每表文件表空间中，当然也可以从备份中仅还原某些表和/或分区。此页面记录了如何还原单个表和分区。

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup, you have the option of performing a full or an incremental backup. Full backups create a complete backup of the database server in an empty directory while incremental backups update a previous backup with whatever changes to the data have occurred since the backup. This page documents how to perform full backups.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mariabackup时,您可以选择执行完全备份或增量备份。完全备份在一个空目录中创建数据库服务器的完整备份,而增量备份则根据备份后发生的任何数据变化更新以前的备份。本页介绍了如何执行完全备份。

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup, you have the option of performing a full or incremental backup. Full backups create a complete copy in an empty directory while incremental backups update a previous backup with new data. This page documents incremental backups.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mariabackup时,您可以选择执行完全备份或增量备份。完全备份在空目录中创建一个完整的副本,而增量备份则用新数据更新以前的备份。本页介绍了增量备份。

trans-unit.source: When using Mariabackup, you have the option of performing partial backups. Partial backups allow you to choose which databases or tables to backup, as long as the table or partition involved is in an InnoDB file-per-table tablespace.This page documents how to perform partial backups.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mariabackup时，可以选择执行部分备份。部分备份允许您选择要备份的数据库或表，只要所涉及的表或分区位于InnoDB每表文件表空间中即可。此页面记录了如何执行部分备份。

trans-unit.source: When using SQL_NO_CACHE, it should be after the first SELECT hint, for example :
trans-unit.target: 当使用SQL_NO_CACHE时,它应该在第一个SELECT提示之后,例如。

trans-unit.source: When using a user-defined function.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户定义的函数时。

trans-unit.source: When using a Page Size of 4KB or 8KB, the maximum index key length is lowered proportionately.
trans-unit.target: 当使用4KB或8KB的页面大小时,最大索引键长度按比例降低。

trans-unit.source: When using an SST method that blocks the donor, there is yet another reason to require a minimum of 3 nodes. In a 3-node cluster, if one node is acting as an SST joiner and one other node is acting as an SST donor, then there is still one more node to continue executing queries.
trans-unit.target: 当使用阻塞供体的SST方法时,还有一个理由要求至少有3个节点。在一个3节点的集群中,如果一个节点作为SST连接者,而另外一个节点作为SST供体,那么还有一个节点可以继续执行查询。

trans-unit.source: When using cascading foreign keys, operations in the cascade don't activate triggers.
trans-unit.target: 使用级联外键时，级联中的操作不会激活触发器。

trans-unit.source: When using data type JSON , one should convert type to TEXT, virtual generated column works the same after.
trans-unit.target: 当使用数据类型为JSON时,需要将类型转换为TEXT,虚拟生成的列后也可以使用。

trans-unit.source: When using data-at-rest encryption with the InnoDB or XtraDB storage engines, it is not necessary that you encrypt every table in your database. You can check which tables are encrypted and which are not by querying the INNODB_TABLESPACES_ENCRYPTION table in the Information Schema. This table provides information on which tablespaces are encrypted, which encryption key each tablespace is encrypted with, and whether the background encryption threads are currently working on the tablespace. Since the system tablespace can also contain tables, it can be helpful to join the INNODB_TABLESPACES_ENCRYPTION table with the INNODB_SYS_TABLES table to find out the encryption status of each specific table, rather than each tablespace. For example:
trans-unit.target: 将静态数据加密与InnoDB或XtraDB存储引擎一起使用时，不必对数据库中的每个表进行加密。您可以通过查询Information Schema中的 INNODB_TABLESPACES_ENCRYPTION 表来检查哪些表已加密，哪些未加密。该表提供有关哪些表空间被加密，每个表空间使用哪个加密密钥进行加密以及后台加密线程当前是否在该表空间上工作的信息。由于系统表空间也可以包含表，因此将 INNODB_TABLESPACES_ENCRYPTION 表与 INNODB_SYS_TABLES 连接起来可能会有所帮助table来查找每个特定表而不是每个表空间的加密状态。例如：

trans-unit.source: When using encrypted binary logs with replication, it is completely supported to have different encryption keys on the master and slave. The master decrypts encrypted binary log events as it reads them from disk, and before its binary log dump thread sends them to the slave, so the slave actually receives the unencrypted binary log events.
trans-unit.target: 将加密的二进制日志用于复制时，完全支持在主服务器和从服务器上使用不同的加密密钥。主服务器在从磁盘读取加密的二进制日志事件时将其解密，并且在其二进制日志转储线程将它们发送到从属服务器之前，因此从属服务器实际上会接收未加密的二进制日志事件。

trans-unit.source: When using field COMPRESSED attribute, 1 byte is reserved to metadata, for example VARCHAR(255) will use +2bytes instead of +1
trans-unit.target: 当使用字段COMPRESSED属性时,元数据保留1个字节,例如VARCHAR(255)将使用+2字节而不是+1。

trans-unit.source: When using global locks, even with a high value on the thread_pool_max_threads system variable, it is still possible to block the entire pool.
trans-unit.target: 使用全局锁时，即使 thread_pool_max_threads 系统变量的值较高，也仍然可以阻止整个池。

trans-unit.source: When using index hints (USE, FORCE or IGNORE INDEX), the index name value can also be an unambiguous prefix of an index name.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引提示（USE，FORCE或IGNORE INDEX）时，索引名称值也可以是索引名称的明确前缀。

trans-unit.source: When using index hints (USE, FORCE or IGNORE INDEX), the index name value can also be an unambiguous prefix of an index name.
trans-unit.target: 当使用索引提示 (USE,FORCE 或 IGNORE INDEX)时,索引名的值也可以是索引名的明确前缀。

trans-unit.source: When using join_cache_level = 6 to get faster joins on the network it is recommended to use :
trans-unit.target: 当使用join_cache_level=6时,为了在网络上获得更快的加入速度,建议使用.NET技术。

trans-unit.source: When using mixed character sets, use the CHARACTER SET clause in both SELECT INTO OUTFILE and LOAD DATA INFILE to ensure that MariaDB correctly interprets the escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 使用混合字符集时，请在 SELECT INTO OUTFILE 和 LOAD DATA INFILE 中使用 CHARACTER SET 子句，以确保MariaDB正确解释转义序列。

trans-unit.source: When using multi-source replication, where a single slave connects to multiple masters at the same time, each such master should be configured with its own distinct domain ID.
trans-unit.target: 当使用多源复制时,即一个从站同时连接到多个主站时,每个这样的主站都应该配置自己不同的域ID。

trans-unit.source: When using multiple instances, each instance will of course also need their own datadir. See mysql_install_db for information on how to initialize the datadir for additional MariaDB instances.
trans-unit.target: 当使用多个实例时，每个实例当然也需要自己的 datadir 。有关如何初始化其他MariaDB实例的 datadir 的信息，请参见mysql_install_db。

trans-unit.source: When using old MariaDB versions, an alternative is to use java command or CmakeCMake to produce a *.jar result instead of just *.class files. The advantage is that you can have all the wrapper files built into only one jar file. Here is an example of CMakeLists.txt file that I use to compile all java files into one JdbcInterface.jar file:
trans-unit.target: 当使用旧版本的MariaDB时,另一种方法是使用java命令或CmakeCMake来产生一个*.jar结果,而不只是*.class文件。这样做的好处是,你可以将所有的包装文件内置到一个jar文件中。下面是一个CMakeLists.txt文件的例子,我用它把所有的java文件编译成一个JdbcInterface.jar文件。

trans-unit.source: When using out-of-order parallel replication, the current slave position in the master's binlog becomes multi-dimensional - each replication domain can have reached a different point in the master binlog at any one time. The current position can be seen from the variable gtid_slave_pos. When the slave is stopped, restarted, or switched to replicate from a different master using CHANGE MASTER, MariaDB automatically handles restarting each replication domain at the appropriate point in the binlog.
trans-unit.target: 当使用无序并行复制时，主从binlog中的当前从服务器位置将变为多维-每个复制域在任何时候都可以达到主从Binlog中的不同点。当前位置可以从变量 gtid_slave_pos 看到。当从属服务器停止，重新启动或使用CHANGE MASTER切换到其他主服务器进行复制时，MariaDB会在binlog中的适当位置自动处理重启每个复制域。

trans-unit.source: When using row-based replication, the binary log does not contain SQL statements, only discrete single-row insert/update/delete events. This can make it harder to read mysqlbinlog output and understand where in an application a given event may have originated, complicating analysis and debugging.
trans-unit.target: 使用基于行的复制时，二进制日志不包含SQL语句，而仅包含离散的单行插入/更新/删除事件。这会使读取mysqlbinlog输出和了解应用程序中某个给定事件可能起源的位置变得更加困难，从而使分析和调试更加复杂。

trans-unit.source: When using second table just to check for existence:
trans-unit.target: 当使用第二个表只是为了检查是否存在。

trans-unit.source: When using the --retry option to retry failed tests, stop when N failures have occured (default 2). Setting it to 0 or 1 effectively turns off retries.
trans-unit.target: 当使用--retry选项重试失败的测试时,当出现N次失败时停止(默认为2)。将其设置为0或1可以有效地关闭重试。

trans-unit.source: When using the General Query Log, non-root users may encounter issues when querying Spider tables. Explicitly setting the spider_internal_sql_log_off system variable causes the Spider node to execute SET sql_log_off statements on the data nodes to enable or disable the General Query Log. When this is done, queries issued by users without the SUPER privilege raise an error.
trans-unit.target: 使用常规查询日志时，非root用户在查询Spider表时可能会遇到问题。显式设置 spider_internal_sql_log_off 系统变量会使Spider节点在数据节点上执行 SET sql_log_off 语句以启用或禁用常规查询日志。完成此操作后，没有 SUPER 特权的用户发出的查询将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: When using the Windows MSI installer, mariabackup can be installed by selecting Backup utilities:
trans-unit.target: 使用Windows MSI安装程序时，可以通过选择备份实用程序来安装 mariabackup ：

trans-unit.source: When using the --backup command option, Mariabackup produces a number of backup files in the target directory. Using this option, you can have Mariabackup produce additional copies of the xtrabackup_checkpoints and xtrabackup_info# files in the given directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用 --backup 命令选项时，Mariabackup在目标目录中生成许多备份文件。使用此选项，您可以让Mariabackup xtrabackup_info# files in the given directory. 生成 xtrabackup_checkpoints 和xtrabackup_info＃文件的其他副本。

trans-unit.source: When using the mysqlbinlog client program, there are similar issues.
trans-unit.target: 使用 mysqlbinlog 客户端程序时，存在类似的问题。

trans-unit.source: When using the COMPRESSED attribute, note that FIELD LENGTH is reduced by 1; for example, a BLOB has a length of 65535, while BLOB COMPRESSED has 65535-1. See MDEV-15592.
trans-unit.target: 使用 COMPRESSED 属性时，请注意，FIELD LENGTH减小了1；例如，BLOB的长度为65535，而BLOB COMPRESSED的长度为65535-1。参见MDEV-15592。

trans-unit.source: When using the cpimport utility, the input file must be converted to UTF-8 data. The Linux program iconv is one utility to convert it.
trans-unit.target: 当使用cpimport实用程序时,必须将输入文件转换为UTF-8数据。Linux程序iconv就是一个转换它的工具。

trans-unit.source: When using the standard SELinux policy with the mode set to enforcing, mysqld does not have access to /usr/share/cracklib, and you may see the following error when attempting to use the cracklib_password_check plugin:
trans-unit.target: 当使用标准SELinux策略并将模式设置为 enforcing 时， mysqld 无法访问 /usr/share/cracklib ，并且在尝试使用 cracklib_password_check 插件时可能会看到以下错误：

trans-unit.source: When using this format, the table is processed by CONNECT like a DOS, CSV or FMT table. Rows are retrieved and parsed by records and the table can be very large. Another advantage is that such a table can be indexed, which can be of great value for very large tables. The “distrib” option of the “state” column tells CONNECT to use block indexing when possible.
trans-unit.target: 使用此格式时，该表由CONNECT处理，就像DOS，CSV或FMT表一样。通过记录检索和解析行，并且表可能非常大。另一个优点是可以为这样的表建立索引，这对于非常大的表可能具有很大的价值。“状态”列的“分散”选项告诉CONNECT在可能的情况下使用块索引。

trans-unit.source: When using this option, Mariabackup records its operation in a table on the MariaDB Server. Passing a name to this option allows you group backups under arbitrary terms for later processing and analysis.
trans-unit.target: 使用该选项时,Mariabackup会将其操作记录在MariaDB服务器上的一个表中。传递一个名称到这个选项,可以让你将备份按照任意的条款进行分组,以便以后处理和分析。

trans-unit.source: When using this option, you should keep in mind that only InnoDB tables are dumped in a consistent state. The single-transaction feature depends not only on the engine being transactional and capable of REPEATABLE-READ, but also on START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT. The dump is not guaranteed to be consistent for other storage engines. For example, any TokuDB, MyISAM or MEMORY tables dumped while using this option may still change state.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项时，应记住只有InnoDB表以一致状态转储。单一交易功能不仅取决于引擎是否具有事务性且可重复读取，而且还取决于具有连续快照的START TRANSACTION。不保证转储与其他存储引擎一致。例如，使用此选项时转储的任何TokuDB，MyISAM或MEMORY表可能仍会更改状态。

trans-unit.source: When values from different columns are compared, the comparison runs more quickly when the columns are of the same character set and collation. If they are different, the strings need to be converted while the query runs. So, where possible, declare string columns using the same character set and collation when you may need to compare them.
trans-unit.target: 当对不同列的值进行比较时,如果列的字符集和整理方式相同,比较运行的速度会更快。如果它们不同,则需要在查询运行时对字符串进行转换。所以,在可能需要比较时,尽可能使用相同的字符集和整理方式声明字符串列。

trans-unit.source: When working with a segmented key cache any key cache interface function that needs only one page has to acquire the key cache lock only for the segment the page is assigned to. This makes the chances for threads not having to compete for the same key cache lock better.
trans-unit.target: 在使用分段式密钥缓存时,任何只需要一个页面的密钥缓存接口函数都必须只获取该页面所分配的段的密钥缓存锁。这使得线程不必争夺同一个密钥缓存锁的机会更大。

trans-unit.source: When working with internal temporary tables written to disk, Aria encrypts them to disk using the ID 2 key, unless there is no ID 2 key, then it falls back on the ID 1 key.
trans-unit.target: 在处理写到磁盘上的内部临时表时,Aria会使用ID 2密钥将其加密到磁盘上,除非没有ID 2密钥,否则就会回到ID 1密钥。

trans-unit.source: When working with user-created tables, Aria encrypts them to disk using the ID 1 key.
trans-unit.target: 当使用用户创建的表时,Aria会使用ID 1密钥将其加密到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: When would `meta_key` or `meta_value` ever be NULL?
trans-unit.target: 什么时候`meta_key`或`meta_value`会变成NULL?

trans-unit.source: When you add a constraint to a table, whether through a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE...ADD CONSTRAINT statement, you can either set a constraint_name yourself, or allow MariaDB to auto-generate one for you. To view constraints on a table, query information_schema.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS. For instance,
trans-unit.target: 将约束添加到表时，无论是通过 CREATE TABLE 还是 ALTER TABLE...ADD CONSTRAINT 语句，您都可以自己设置 constraint_name ，也可以让MariaDB为您自动生成一个约束。要查看表上的约束，请查询 information_schema.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS 。例如，

trans-unit.source: When you are installing a plugin, you also have to ensure that:
trans-unit.target: 当你在安装插件时,你还必须确保。

trans-unit.source: When you are troubleshooting issues that you think SELinux might be causing, it can help to temporarily put mysqld_t into permissive mode. This can be done by executing the semanage command. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当您解决SELinux可能引起的问题时，可以将 mysqld_t 暂时置于允许模式。这可以通过执行 semanage 命令来完成。例如：

trans-unit.source: When you are using multi source, the following new files are created:
trans-unit.target: 当您使用多源时,将创建以下新文件。

trans-unit.source: When you commit or roll back a transaction, any locks set in the transaction are released. You don't need to issue LOCK TABLES statements when the autocommit is enabled, as InnoDB would immediately release the table locks.
trans-unit.target: 提交或回滚事务时，将释放事务中设置的所有锁。启用自动提交功能后，您无需发出LOCK TABLES语句，因为InnoDB会立即释放表锁。

trans-unit.source: When you create a table on MariaDB ColumnStore, the system creates at least one file per column in the table. So, for instance, a table created with three columns would have a minimum of three, separately addressable logical objects created on a SAN or on the local disk of a Performance Module.
trans-unit.target: 当你在MariaDB ColumnStore上创建一个表时,系统会为表中的每一列至少创建一个文件。因此,例如,一个创建了三列的表,在SAN上或性能模块的本地磁盘上至少会创建三个、可单独寻址的逻辑对象。

trans-unit.source: When you create a table using the InnoDB storage engine, data written to that table is stored on the file system in a data file called a tablespace. Tablespace files contain both the data and indexes.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB存储引擎创建表时，写入该表的数据将存储在文件系统中的数据文件中，该数据文件称为表空间。表空间文件包含数据和索引。

trans-unit.source: When you create a table using the CSV storage engine, three files are created:
trans-unit.target: 使用CSV存储引擎创建表时,会创建三个文件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a table with FederatedX, the connection will be tested. The CREATE will fail if MariaDB can't connect to the remote host or if the remote table doesn't exist.
trans-unit.target: 使用FederatedX创建表时，将测试连接。在 CREATE 如果MariaDB的无法连接到远程主机或者远程表不存在将失败。

trans-unit.source: When you discover any needed SELinux permissions, please report the needed permissions to your operating system bug tracking so all users can benefit from your work (e.g. Red Hat Bugzilla https://bugzilla.redhat.com/).
trans-unit.target: 当发现任何所需的SELinux权限时，请向操作系统错误跟踪报告所需的权限，以便所有用户都可以从您的工作中受益（例如Red Hat Bugzilla https://bugzilla.redhat.com/）。

trans-unit.source: When you execute the LOAD DATA INFILE statement, MariaDB Server attempts to read the input file from its own file system. In contrast, when you execute the LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE statement, the client attempts to read the input file from its file system, and it sends the contents of the input file to the MariaDB Server. This allows you to load files from the client's local file system into the database.
trans-unit.target: 当执行 LOAD DATA INFILE 语句时，MariaDB Server尝试从其自己的文件系统中读取输入文件。相反，当您执行 LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE 语句时，客户端会尝试从其文件系统读取输入文件，并将输入文件的内容发送到MariaDB服务器。这使您可以将文件从客户端的本地文件系统加载到数据库中。

trans-unit.source: When you got the connection to work, you should add the options to your global my.cnf file. Now you can start testing S3 from your mysql command client by converting some existing table to S3 with ALTER TABLE ... ENGINE=S3.
trans-unit.target: 建立连接后，应将选项添加到全局my.cnf文件中。现在，您可以通过使用ALTER TABLE ... ENGINE = S3将一些现有表转换为S3，从mysql命令客户端开始测试S3。

trans-unit.source: When you have a JOIN and a GROUP BY, you may have the situation where the JOIN exploded more rows than the original query (due to many:many), but you wanted only one row from the original table, so you added the GROUP BY to implode back to the desired set of rows.
trans-unit.target: 当你有一个JOIN和一个GROUP BY时,你可能会出现这样的情况:JOIN爆出的行数比原来的查询多(由于多:多),但你只想从原来的表中得到一条行,所以你添加了GROUP BY来内爆回想要的行数集。

trans-unit.source: When you have millions or billions of rows, it takes a long time to summarize the data to present counts, totals, averages, etc, in a size that is readily digestible by humans. By computing and saving subtotals as the data comes in, one can make "reports" run much faster. (I have seen 10x to 1000x speedups.) The subtotals go into a "summary table". This document guides you on efficiency in both creating and using such tables.
trans-unit.target: 当你有几百万或几十亿行的数据时,需要花很长时间来汇总数据,以人类容易消化的大小来呈现计数、总计、平均值等。通过在数据到来时计算并保存小计,可以使 "报表 "运行速度大大加快。(我见过10倍到1000倍的速度。)小计将进入一个 "汇总表"。本文档指导你如何高效地创建和使用这种表格。

trans-unit.source: When you issue a DELETE statement, InnoDB doesn't regenerate the table, rather it deletes each row from the table one by one.
trans-unit.target: 当您发出DELETE语句时，InnoDB不会重新生成表，而是会逐一删除表中的每一行。

trans-unit.source: When you mark an article for deletion; you must remove it from Lists:
trans-unit.target: 将文章标记为删除时；您必须将其从列表中删除：

trans-unit.source: When you order by a field that may contain NULL values, any NULLs are considered to have the lowest value. So ordering in DESC order will see the NULLs appearing last. To force NULLs to be regarded as highest values, one can add another column which has a higher value when the main field is NULL. Example:
trans-unit.target: 当您按可能包含NULL值的字段排序时,任何NULL值都被认为是最低值。因此,按DESC顺序排序时,NULL值将出现在最后。要强制将NULL值视为最高值,可以在主字段为NULL时添加另一列,该列的值更高。例如

trans-unit.source: When you perform a shutdown, all MariaDB ColumnStore processes are stopped. This command would be used mainly when performing software upgrades.
trans-unit.target: 当你执行关闭时,所有的MariaDB ColumnStore进程都会停止。这个命令主要用于执行软件升级时。

trans-unit.source: When you precede a SELECT statement (or, since MariaDB 10.0.5, an UPDATE or a DELETE as well) with the keyword EXPLAIN, MariaDB displays information from the optimizer about the query execution plan. That is, MariaDB explains how it would process the SELECT, UPDATE or DELETE, including information about how tables are joined and in which order. EXPLAIN EXTENDED can be used to provide additional information.
trans-unit.target: 当您在带有关键字 EXPLAIN 的 SELECT 语句（或者从MariaDB 10.0.5开始，也包括 UPDATE 或 DELETE ）之前，MariaDB将显示来自优化程序的有关查询执行计划的信息。也就是说，MariaDB解释了它将如何处理 SELECT ， UPDATE 或 DELETE ，包括有关如何联接表以及以什么顺序联接表的信息。 EXPLAIN EXTENDED 可用于提供其他信息。

trans-unit.source: When you provide an offset m with a limit n, the first m rows will be ignored, and the following n rows will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 当您提供的偏移m的限制为n时，前m行将被忽略，而后n行将被返回。

trans-unit.source: When you run Mariabackup with the --compress option, it compresses the subsequent backup files, using the QuickLZ algorithm by default, (which is currently the only available compression algorithm). Using this option, Mariabackup decompresses the compressed files from a previous backup.
trans-unit.target: 使用 --compress 选项运行Mariabackup时，它将默认情况下使用QuickLZ算法（当前是唯一可用的压缩算法）压缩后续的备份文件。使用此选项，Mariabackup将先前备份中的压缩文件解压缩。

trans-unit.source: When you run Mariabackup, it connects to MariaDB Server in order to access and back up the databases and tables. Using this option, you can set the password Mariabackup uses to access the server. To set the user, use the --user option.
trans-unit.target: 当您运行Mariabackup时，它将连接到MariaDB Server，以便访问和备份数据库和表。使用此选项，您可以设置Mariabackup用来访问服务器的密码。要设置用户，请使用 --user 选项。

trans-unit.source: When you run Mariabackup, it connects to MariaDB Server in order to access and back up your databases and tables. Using this option, you can set the port the utility uses to access the server over TCP/IP. To set the host, see the --host option. Use mysql --help for more details.
trans-unit.target: 运行Mariabackup时，它会连接到MariaDB Server，以便访问和备份数据库和表。使用此选项，您可以设置实用程序用于通过TCP / IP访问服务器的端口。要设置主机，请参见 --host 选项。使用 mysql --help 可获得更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: When you run the mxs_adapter utility, it streams logging messages about the operations it's performing to stdout. You can monitor this information to see the binary events its streaming from the MariaDB Servers to MariaDB ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: 当您运行 mxs_adapter 实用程序时，它将有关正在执行的操作的日志记录消息流式传输到stdout。您可以监视此信息以查看其从MariaDB服务器流到MariaDB ColumnStore的二进制事件。

trans-unit.source: When you selectively enable or disable the effect of a group option, order is important because options are processed first to last. For example, --disable-keys--lock-tables--skip-opt would not have the intended effect; it is the same as --skip-opt by itself.
trans-unit.target: 当您有选择地启用或禁用组选项的效果时，顺序很重要，因为选项是从头到尾处理的。例如，-- --disable-keys --lock-tables --skip-opt 将不会达到预期的效果；它本身与 --skip-opt 相同。

trans-unit.source: When you start MariaDB again, it'll read and write InnoDB data to the given disk partition instead of the file system.
trans-unit.target: 当你再次启动MariaDB时,它会将InnoDB数据读写到给定的磁盘分区而不是文件系统。

trans-unit.source: When you start MariaDB, the AWS KMS plugin will connect to the AWS Key Management Service and ask it to generate a new key. MariaDB will store that key on-disk in an encrypted form. The key stored on-disk cannot be used to decrypt the data; rather, on each startup, MariaDB must connect to AWS KMS and have the service decrypt the locally-stored key. The decrypted version is stored in-memory as long as the MariaDB server process is running, and that in-memory decrypted key is used to encrypt the local data.
trans-unit.target: 当你启动MariaDB时,AWS KMS插件将连接到AWS密钥管理服务,并要求它生成一个新的密钥。MariaDB会将该密钥以加密的形式存储在磁盘上。存储在磁盘上的密钥不能用于解密数据;相反,在每次启动时,MariaDB必须连接到AWS KMS,并让服务对本地存储的密钥进行解密。只要MariaDB服务器进程在运行,解密后的版本就会存储在内存中,而该内存中的解密密钥就会被用来加密本地数据。

trans-unit.source: When you start streaming data, the mxs_adapter utility begins printing logging messages to stdout. As you add data to the MariaDB Servers, you can check this output to see binary events streaming over to ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: 当您开始流式传输数据时， mxs_adapter 实用程序开始将日志记录消息打印到stdout。将数据添加到MariaDB服务器时，可以检查此输出以查看二进制事件流到ColumnStore的情况。

trans-unit.source: When you start the MariaDB service now, the wrapper will temporarily create a socket file at the location given by the kms_mfa_socket option. The wrapper will read the MFA code from the socket and will use it to authenticate to KMS. To give the MFA code, simply write the digits to the socket file using echo: echo 111676 > /tmp/kms_mfa_socket.
trans-unit.target: 现在启动MariaDB服务时，包装程序将在 kms_mfa_socket 选项指定的位置临时创建一个套接字文件。包装程序将从套接字读取MFA代码，并将其用于向KMS进行身份验证。要提供MFA代码，只需使用 echo 将数字写入套接字文件： echo 111676 > /tmp/kms_mfa_socket 。

trans-unit.source: When you use mysqld_safe to start mysqld, mysqld_safe logs to the same destination as mysqld.
trans-unit.target: 当您使用 mysqld_safe 启动 mysqld 时， mysqld_safe 记录到与 mysqld 相同的目的地。

trans-unit.source: When you use the --safe-updates option, mysql issues the following statement when it connects to the MariaDB server:
trans-unit.target: 当使用 --safe-updates 选项时，mysql在连接到MariaDB服务器时会发出以下语句：

trans-unit.target: 当您想要重复项，而不是假重复项时。假设 Table_1 有三行- { 1 ， 1 ， 2 } -和 Table_2 具有两行- { 1 ， 2 ， 2 }。如果你需要列出行 Table_1 这也是 Table_2 ，只有这种基于子查询， SELECT 语句将得到正确的答案（ 1 ， 1 ， 2 ）：

trans-unit.source: When you want to see the exception. For example, suppose the question is: what books are longer than Das Kapital? These two queries are effectively almost the same:
trans-unit.target: 当你想看例外的时候。例如,假设问题是:什么书比《资本论》长?这两个疑问实际上几乎是一样的。

trans-unit.source: When you want to split your database load on several servers or optimize for scaling. We also suggest looking at Galera, a synchronous multi-master cluster.
trans-unit.target: 当您想在几台服务器上拆分数据库负载或为扩展而优化时。我们还建议您查看Galera（同步多主群集）。

trans-unit.source: When you want to stop and immediately start application processes, you can perform a restart. You restart the system or modules application processes with the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 当您想停止并立即启动应用程序进程时,可以执行重启。使用以下命令重启系统或模块的应用程序进程。

trans-unit.source: When you want to use data not stored in a MariaDB database.
trans-unit.target: 当你想使用未存储在MariaDB数据库中的数据时。

trans-unit.source: When you're ready to install MariaDB Platform X3, go to Downloads and select Platform X3. If you use an RPM or APT based distribution of Linux, you can configure your server repositories to install it through the package manager.
trans-unit.target: 准备安装MariaDB Platform X3时，请转到“ 下载”，然后选择Platform X3。如果使用Linux的基于RPM或APT的发行版，则可以配置服务器存储库以通过程序包管理器进行安装。

trans-unit.source: When your application issues queries to Platform X3 for HTAP operations, it doesn't connect to either the MariaDB Servers or to the MariaDB ColumnStore User Modules directly. Instead, it connects to a MaxScale server configured to selectively routes queries, ensuring that OLTP operations execute on MariaDB Servers and OLAP operations execute on ColumnStore.
trans-unit.target: 当您的应用程序向Platform X3发出HTAP操作的查询时,它不会直接连接到MariaDB服务器或MariaDB ColumnStore用户模块。相反,它连接到配置为有选择地路由查询的 MaxScale 服务器,确保 OLTP 操作在 MariaDB 服务器上执行,OLAP 操作在 ColumnStore 上执行。

trans-unit.source: Whenever InnoDB flushes a page to disk, it is first written to the double write buffer. Only when the buffer is safely flushed to disk will InnoDB write the page to the final destination. When recovering, InnoDB scans the double write buffer and for each valid page in the buffer checks if the page in the data file is valid too.
trans-unit.target: 每当InnoDB将一个页面刷新到磁盘时,它首先被写入双写缓冲区。只有当缓冲区安全地刷新到磁盘时,InnoDB才会将页面写到最终目的地。恢复时,InnoDB会扫描双写缓冲区,对于缓冲区中的每一个有效页面,都会检查数据文件中的页面是否也有效。

trans-unit.source: Whenever an Innodb datafile is opened, a special ioctl() is issued to switch on atomic writes. If the call fails, an error is logged and returned to the caller. This means that if the system tablespace is not located on an atomic write capable device or filesystem, InnoDB/XtraDB will refuse to start.
trans-unit.target: 每当打开Innodb数据文件时，都会发出特殊的 ioctl() 来打开原子写入。如果呼叫失败，则会记录错误并返回给呼叫者。这意味着，如果系统表空间不在具有原子写功能的设备或文件系统上，则InnoDB / XtraDB将拒绝启动。

trans-unit.source: Whenever possible, the fixed format should be preferred to the varying one because it is much faster to deal with fixed tables than with variable tables. Sure enough, instead of being read or written record by record, FIX tables are processed by blocks of BLOCK_SIZE records, resulting in far less input/output operations to execute. The block size defaults to 100 if not specified in the Create Table statement.
trans-unit.target: 只要有可能，固定格式应优先于变化格式，因为处理固定表比使用可变表要快得多。当然，FIX表不是由记录读取或写入记录，而是由 BLOCK_SIZE 记录块处理，从而减少了要执行的输入/输出操作。如果未在“创建表”语句中指定，则块大小默认为100。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the above PAM service is used, the output of the script will be written to /tmp/pam_output.txt. It may look similar to this:
trans-unit.target: 无论何时使用以上PAM服务，脚本的输出都会写入 /tmp/pam_output.txt 。它可能看起来类似于：

trans-unit.source: Whenever you change the value on the innodb_encrypt_tables system variable, InnoDB's background encryption threads perform the necessary encryption or decryption operations. Because of this, you must have a non-zero value set for the innodb_encryption_threads system variable. InnoDB also considers these operations to be key rotations internally. Because of this, you must have a non-zero value set for the innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age system variable. For more information, see disabling key rotations.
trans-unit.target: 每当您更改 innodb_encrypt_tables 系统变量上的值时，InnoDB的后台加密线程都会执行必要的加密或解密操作。因此，必须为 innodb_encryption_threads 系统变量设置一个非零值。InnoDB还在内部将这些操作视为关键轮换。因此，必须为 innodb_encryption_rotate_key_age 系统变量设置一个非零值。有关更多信息，请参阅禁用键旋转。

trans-unit.source: Where "n" is the number of incremental backups to store. (Default: 3)
trans-unit.target: 其中 "n "是要存储的增量备份数量。(默认值:3)

trans-unit.source: Where $BASEDIR is set by the --basedir option, $PWD is the current working directory where mysqld_safe was invoked, and @libexecdir@ is set at compile-time by the INSTALL_BINDIR option for cmake.
trans-unit.target: 其中 $BASEDIR 由 --basedir 选项设置， $PWD 是当前工作目录，在该目录中调用 mysqld_safe ，而 @libexecdir@ 在编译时由 cmake 的 INSTALL_BINDIR 选项设置。

trans-unit.source: Where $BASEDIR is set by the --basedir option, and @localstatedir@ is set at compile-time by the INSTALL_MYSQLDATADIR option for cmake.
trans-unit.target: 其中 $BASEDIR 由 --basedir 选项设置， @localstatedir@ 在编译时由 cmake 的 INSTALL_MYSQLDATADIR 选项设置。

trans-unit.source: Where can I find documentation and help about Aria?
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以找到关于Aria的文档和帮助?

trans-unit.source: Where can I get FederatedX
trans-unit.target: 我在哪里可以获得FederatedX

trans-unit.source: Where character-string has zero or more characters; identifier has one or more characters; attribute- keyword is not case-sensitive; attribute-value may be case-sensitive; and the value of the DSN keyword does not consist solely of blanks. Due to the connection string grammar, keywords and attribute values that contain the characters []{}(),;?*=!@ should be avoided. The value of the DSN keyword cannot consist only of blanks, and should not contain leading blanks. Because of the grammar of the system information, keywords and data source names cannot contain the backslash (\) character. Applications do not have to add braces around the attribute value after the DRIVER keyword unless the attribute contains a semicolon (;), in which case the braces are required. If the attribute value that the driver receives includes the braces, the driver should not remove them, but they should be part of the returned connection string.
trans-unit.target: 字符串中包含零个或多个字符；标识符具有一个或多个字符； attribute-keyword不区分大小写；属性值可能区分大小写；并且DSN关键字的值不只包含空格。由于连接字符串的语法，包含字符 []{}(),;?*=!@ 的关键字和属性值应该避免。DSN关键字的值不能仅包含空格，并且不能包含前导空格。由于系统信息的语法，关键字和数据源名称不能包含反斜杠（\）字符。除非属性包含分号（;），否则应用程序不必在DRIVER关键字后的属性值周围添加括号。如果驱动程序接收的属性值包含括号，则驱动程序不应删除它们，而应将其作为返回的连接字符串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Where it is an option, it is recommended to use bare metal servers for additional performance since ColumnStore will fully consume CPU cores and memory.
trans-unit.target: 在可以选择的情况下,建议使用裸机服务器以获得额外的性能,因为ColumnStore将充分消耗CPU核心和内存。

trans-unit.source: Where sum_foo2 is SUM(foo * foo) from the summary table. sum_foo and sum_foo2 should be FLOAT. FLOAT gives you about 7 significant digits, which is more than enough for things like average and standard deviation. FLOAT occupies 4 bytes. DOUBLE would give you more precision, but occupies 8 bytes. INT and BIGINT are not practical because they may lead to complaints about overflow.
trans-unit.target: 其中sum_foo2是来自汇总表的sum(foo*foo)。sum_foo和sum_foo2应该是float。FLOAT给你提供了大约7位有意义的数字,这对于平均数和标准差这样的东西来说已经足够了。FLOAT 占用 4 个字节。DOUBLE会给你更多的精度,但是会占用8个字节。INT和BIGINT是不实用的,因为它们可能会导致溢出的抱怨。

trans-unit.source: Where t1 is an ODBC table, t2 is a locally defined table that must exist on the local server. Besides, it is a good way to create a distant ODBC table from local data.
trans-unit.target: 其中t1是ODBC表,t2是本地定义的表,必须存在于本地服务器上。此外,从本地数据中创建远端ODBC表也是一个不错的方法。

trans-unit.source: Where things become more difficult is when trying to delete or insert an author of a book. Indeed, a delete command will delete the whole book and an insert command will add a new complete row instead of adding a new author in the same array. Here we are penalized by the SQL language that cannot give us a way to specify this. Something like:

trans-unit.source: Where two rows match the unique keys match, only the first is updated. This can be unsafe and is not recommended unless you are certain what you are doing. Note that the warning shown below appears in MariaDB 5.5 and before, but has been removed in MariaDB 10.0, as MariaDB now assumes that the keys are checked in order, as shown in SHOW CREATE TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 如果两行匹配的唯一键匹配，则仅更新第一行。除非您确定自己在做什么，否则这可能是不安全的，因此不建议这样做。请注意，以下所示的警告出现在MariaDB 5.5及更高版本中，但已在MariaDB 10.0中被删除，因为MariaDB现在假定按顺序检查了密钥，如SHOW CREATE TABLE所示。

trans-unit.source: Where's the problem? Performance. Your web page is doing "SELECT ... OFFSET 49990 LIMIT 10" (or the equivalent "LIMIT 49990,10"). MariaDB has to find all 50,000 rows, step over the first 49,990, then deliver the 10 for that distant page.
trans-unit.target: 问题出在哪里?性能问题。你的网页正在做 "SELECT ...OFFSET 49990 LIMIT 10"(或者等价的 "LIMIT 49990,10")。MariaDB必须找到所有的50,000行,跨过前49,990行,然后为那个遥远的页面提供10行。

trans-unit.source: Whether concurrent inserts can be used or not depends on the value of the concurrent_insert server system variable:

trans-unit.source: Whether the adaptive hash index search latch shoild be relinquished immediately or reserved across all MariaDB calls. 0 if there is no contention on the adaptive hash index, in which case the latch is reserved until completion, otherwise counts down to zero and the latch is released after each row lookup.
trans-unit.target: 立即放弃自适应哈希索引搜索锁存器还是在所有MariaDB调用中保留它。如果在自适应哈希索引上没有争用，则为 0 ，在这种情况下，锁存器将保留到完成，否则递减计数为零，并在每次查找行后释放锁存器。

trans-unit.source: Whether the bloom filter is for the entire key or for the prefix. In case of a prefix, you need to look at the index definition and compute the desired prefix length.
trans-unit.target: bloom过滤器是针对整个键还是针对前缀。如果是前缀,你需要查看索引定义,并计算出所需的前缀长度。

trans-unit.source: Whether the data is bigger than the cache. This last one kicks in when building one page requires reading more data from disk can be cached. At that point, the problem goes from being CPU-bound to being I/O-bound. This is likely to suddenly slow down the loading of a pages by a factor of 10.
trans-unit.target: 数据是否比缓存大。当构建一个页面需要从磁盘上读取更多的数据可以缓存时,最后一个问题就会发作。这时,问题就从CPU的束缚变成了I/O的束缚。这很可能会让一个页面的加载速度突然慢了10倍。

If security is a concern, you can change the bind-address parameter post-installation to bind to only local addresses. If the "Enable networking" checkbox is deselected, the database will use named pipes for communication.

trans-unit.source: Which privileges you have for the column. A MySQL and MariaDB extension.
trans-unit.target: 你对该列有哪些权限。MySQL和MariaDB的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Which the setup to distribute from the Master User Module, any DDL and non-columnstore table creation and population must be done from the Master User Module. This will keep all of the User Module Databases in-sync.
trans-unit.target: 其中设置从主用户模块分发,任何DDL和非columnstore表的创建和人口必须从主用户模块完成。这将使所有的用户模块数据库保持同步。

trans-unit.source: While binlog_format is checked on startup and can only be ROW (see Binary Log Formats), it can be changed at runtime. Do NOT change binlog_format at runtime, it is likely not only cause replication failure, but make all other nodes crash.
trans-unit.target: 虽然在启动时检查binlog_format，并且只能是ROW（请参阅Binary Log Formats），但可以在运行时更改它。不要在运行时更改binlog_format，这不仅可能导致复制失败，而且会使所有其他节点崩溃。

trans-unit.source: While I was at it, I gave an alias to change "MONTH(ts)" to just "Month".
trans-unit.target: 我当时给了一个别名,把 "MONTH(ts)"改为 "Month"。

trans-unit.source: While MariaDB ColumnStore supports multiple ways to get data into the database (individual insert, batch insert, load data infile and import), the most efficient manner to load significant amounts of data into MariaDB ColumnStore is through the import utility.
trans-unit.target: 虽然MariaDB ColumnStore支持多种方式获取数据到数据库中(单独插入、批量插入、在文件中加载数据和导入),但将大量数据加载到MariaDB ColumnStore中的最有效方式是通过导入工具。

trans-unit.source: While MySQL definition might not say anything about Los Angeles being bigger than Adelanto, it is perfectly clear about the type of queries that you use, and says explicitly that behavior here is undefined:
trans-unit.target: 虽然MySQL的定义可能没有说什么洛杉矶比阿德兰托大,但它完全清楚你使用的查询类型,并明确说这里的行为是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: While a --single-transaction dump is in process, to ensure a valid dump file (correct table contents and binary log coordinates), no other connection should use the following statements: ALTER TABLE, CREATE TABLE, DROP TABLE, RENAME TABLE, or TRUNCATE TABLE. A consistent read is not isolated from those statements, so use of them on a table to be dumped can cause the SELECT (performed by mysqldump to retrieve the table contents) to obtain incorrect contents or fail.
trans-unit.target: 在进行 --single-transaction 转储时，为了确保有效的转储文件（正确的表内容和二进制日志坐标），其他任何连接都不应使用以下语句：ALTER TABLE，CREATE TABLE，DROP TABLE，RENAME TABLE或截断表。一致的读取并非与这些语句隔离开，因此在要转储的表上使用它们会导致 SELECT （由mysqldump执行以检索表内容）获得错误的内容或失败。

trans-unit.source: While a SEQUENCE table cannot be dropped, it is possible to drop the converted table. The SEQUENCE table with the same name will still exist:
trans-unit.target: 虽然不能放弃SEQUENCE表,但可以放弃转换后的表。具有相同名称的SEQUENCE表仍将存在。

trans-unit.source: While a connection holds an explicit lock on a table, it cannot access a non-locked table. If you try, the following error will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 当一个连接在表上持有一个显式锁时,它不能访问一个没有锁的表。如果你尝试,将产生以下错误。

trans-unit.source: While a connection holds an explicit lock on a table, it cannot issue the following: INSERT DELAYED, CREATE TABLE, CREATE TABLE ... LIKE, and DDL statements involving stored programs and views (except for triggers). If you try, the following error will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 虽然一个连接在表上持有一个显式锁,但它不能发出以下指令。INSERT DELAYED、CREATE TABLE、CREATE TABLE......。LIKE,以及涉及存储程序和视图的DDL语句(触发器除外)。如果你尝试,将产生以下错误。

trans-unit.source: While a connection holds an explicit read lock on a table, it cannot modify it. If you try, the following error will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 当一个连接持有表的显式读锁时,它不能修改它。如果你尝试,将产生以下错误。

trans-unit.source: While constructing the index, CONNECT also stores in memory the values of other used columns.
trans-unit.target: 在构建索引的同时,CONNECT还将其他使用过的列的值存储在内存中。

trans-unit.source: While each HANDLER READ command is atomic, if you do a scan in many steps, then some engines may give you error 1020 if the table changed between the commands. Please refer to the specific engine handler page if this happens.
trans-unit.target: 尽管每个HANDLER READ命令都是原子的，但是如果您分多个步骤进行扫描，那么如果表在两个命令之间更改，则某些引擎可能会向您显示错误1020。如果发生这种情况，请参阅特定的引擎处理程序页面。

trans-unit.source: While in the mysql client, run:
trans-unit.target: 而在mysql客户端中,运行。

trans-unit.source: While installing MariaDB-10.1.21-centos7-x86_64-common.rpm there might be a conflict with older MariaDB packages. we need to remove them and install the original rpm again.
trans-unit.target: 在安装MariaDB-10.1.21-centos7-x86_64-common.rpm时,可能会与旧的MariaDB包发生冲突,我们需要删除它们,然后重新安装原始的rpm。

trans-unit.source: While installing the Galera package there might be a conflict in installation for a dependency package. Here is the error message:
trans-unit.target: 在安装Galera包时,可能会出现依赖包的安装冲突。以下是错误信息。

trans-unit.source: While it is not recommended, it is possible to download and install the .deb packages manually. However, it is generally recommended to use a package manager like apt-get.
trans-unit.target: 虽然不建议这样做，但是可以手动下载并安装 .deb 软件包。但是，通常建议使用像 apt-get 这样的软件包管理器。

trans-unit.source: While replication is usually meant to take place between masters and slaves with the same table definitions and this is recommended, in certain cases replication can still take place even if the definitions are identical.
trans-unit.target: 虽然复制通常是指在具有相同表定义的主表和从表之间进行,并且建议这样做,但在某些情况下,即使定义相同,也可以进行复制。

trans-unit.source: While some disable swap altogether, and you certainly want to avoid any database processes from using it, it can be prudent to leave some swap space to at least allow the kernel to fall over gracefully should a spike occur. Having emergency swap available at least allows you some scope to kill any runaway processes.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有些人完全禁止交换,而且你当然也想避免任何数据库进程使用它,但是留出一些交换空间是很谨慎的,至少可以让内核在高峰发生的时候可以优雅地倒下。有了紧急交换空间,至少可以让你在一定范围内杀死任何失控的进程。

trans-unit.source: While still inside the container, send the shutdown command to MariaDB. This will shut down the server and also exit back out to the host:
trans-unit.target: 当仍在容器内时,向MariaDB发送shutdown命令。这将关闭服务器,也会退出回到主机。

trans-unit.source: While the MariaDB ColumnStore's autoincrement column attribute behavior it is not identical to MariaDB's implementation. In order to get the correct results from this attribute please read and understand this section.
trans-unit.target: 虽然MariaDB ColumnStore的自动增加列属性行为它与MariaDB的实现不完全相同。为了从这个属性中得到正确的结果,请阅读并理解本节。

trans-unit.source: While the MariaDB Server's EXPLAIN utility can be used to look at the query plan, it is somewhat less helpful for ColumnStore tables as ColumnStore does not use indexes or make use of MariaDB I/O functionality. The execution plan for a query on a ColumnStore table is made up of multiple steps. Each step in the query plan performs a set of operations that are issued from the User Module to the set of Performance Modules in support of a given step in a query.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以使用MariaDB Server的EXPLAIN实用程序查看查询计划，但它对于ColumnStore表的用处不大，因为ColumnStore不使用索引或不使用MariaDB I / O功能。ColumnStore表上的查询的执行计划由多个步骤组成。查询计划中的每个步骤执行一组操作，这些操作从用户模块发布到一组性能模块，以支持查询中的给定步骤。

trans-unit.source: While the character set is defined in a way that satisfies MariaDB, it has not been defined for Oracle, (that is, setting the NLS_LANG environment variable). As a result, Oracle is not providing the characters you want to MariaDB and Connect. The specific method of setting the NLS_LANG variable can vary depending on your operating system or distribution. If you're experiencing this issue, check your OS documentation for more details on how to properly set environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 虽然字符集的定义方式满足MariaDB的要求,但还没有为Oracle定义,(也就是设置NLS_LANG环境变量)。因此,Oracle没有向MariaDB和Connect提供你想要的字符。设置NLS_LANG变量的具体方法会根据你的操作系统或发行版的不同而不同。如果你遇到了这个问题,请查看你的操作系统文档,了解如何正确设置环境变量的更多细节。

trans-unit.source: Why the bogus "start" partition? If an invalid datetime (Feb 31) were to be used, the datetime would turn into NULL. NULLs are put into the first partition. Since any SELECT could have an invalid date (yeah, this stretching things), the partition pruner always includes the first partition in the resulting set of partitions to search. So, if the SELECT must scan the first partition, it would be slightly more efficient if that partition were empty. Hence the bogus "start" partition. Longer discussion, by The Data Charmer 5.5 eliminates the bogus check, but only if you switch to a new syntax:
trans-unit.target: 为什么会有假的 "开始 "分区?如果使用无效的日期时间(2月31日),日期时间会变成NULL。NULL会被放到第一个分区中。由于任何SELECT都可能有一个无效的日期(是的,这很夸张),分区修剪器总是将第一个分区包含在要搜索的结果分区集中。所以,如果SELECT必须扫描第一个分区,如果这个分区是空的,效率会稍微高一些。因此,就有了假的 "开始 "分区。较长的讨论,由The Data Charmer 5.5消除了假检查,但前提是你要换一种新的语法。

trans-unit.source: Window Functions Overview
trans-unit.target: 窗口功能概述

trans-unit.source: Window frames are determined by the frame_clause in the window function request.
trans-unit.target: 窗口框架由窗口函数请求中的frame_clause确定。

trans-unit.source: Window function queries are characterised by the OVER keyword, following which the set of rows used for the calculation is specified. By default, the set of rows used for the calculation (the "window) is the entire dataset, which can be ordered with the ORDER BY clause. The PARTITION BY clause is used to reduce the window to a particular group within the dataset.
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数查询的特点是使用OVER关键字,之后指定用于计算的行集。默认情况下,用于计算的行集("窗口")是整个数据集,可以使用ORDER BY子句进行排序。PARTITION BY子句用于将窗口缩小到数据集中的某个特定组。

trans-unit.source: Window function that returns the cumulative distribution of a given row
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数,返回给定行的累积分布。

trans-unit.source: Window function that returns the cumulative distribution of a given row.
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数,返回给定行的累积分布。

trans-unit.source: Window function that returns the median value of a range of values
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数,返回数值范围的中值。

trans-unit.source: Window function that returns the median value of a range of values.
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数,返回数值范围的中值。

trans-unit.source: Window function that returns the relative percent rank of a given row
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数,返回给定行的相对等级百分比。

trans-unit.source: Window function that returns the relative percent rank of a given row.
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数,返回给定行的相对等级百分比。

trans-unit.source: Window functions allow calculations to be performed across a set of rows related to the current row.
trans-unit.target: 窗口功能允许对与当前行相关的一组行进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Window functions are applied after joins, group by, and having clauses are calculated.
trans-unit.target: 窗口功能是在计算出连接、分组和有句后应用的。

trans-unit.source: Window functions are executed at the UM level due to the need for ordering of the window results. The ColumnStore window function engines uses a dedicated faster sort process.
trans-unit.target: 由于需要对窗口结果进行排序,窗口函数在UM级执行。ColumnStore窗口函数引擎使用了专门的较快排序过程。

trans-unit.source: Window functions can be used to achieve cumulative / running calculations on a detail report. In this case a won opportunity report for a 7 day period adds columns to show the accumulated won amount as well as the current highest opportunity amount in preceding rows.
trans-unit.target: 窗口功能可以用来实现详细报告的累积/运行计算。在这种情况下,一个7天的赢利机会报告增加了列,以显示累积的赢利金额以及前几行中当前最高的机会金额。

trans-unit.source: Window functions for performing calculations on a set of rows related to the current row.
trans-unit.target: 窗口功能,用于对与当前行相关的一组行进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Window functions perform calculations across a set of rows related to the current row
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数对与当前行相关的一组行进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Window functions perform calculations across a set of rows related to the current row.
trans-unit.target: 窗口函数在与当前行相关的一组行上进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Window functions that can be streamed once the number of rows in partition is known: PERCENT_RANK, CUME_DIST, NTILE
trans-unit.target: 知道分区中的行数后就可以流式处理的窗口函数：PERCENT_RANK，CUME_DIST，NTILE

trans-unit.source: Window functions were first introduced in MariaDB 10.2.0.
trans-unit.target: 窗口功能首先在MariaDB 10.2.0中引入。

trans-unit.source: Window functions were introduced in SQL:2003, and their definition was expanded in subsequent versions of the standard. The last expansion was in the latest version of the standard, SQL:2011.

trans-unit.source: With 'traditional' replication, especially if using "Statement Based Replication", all writes to the Master are applied to all Slaves, and they are replayed serially. Even with a multi-master setup, all writes are applied to all Masters. Hence, there is no way to get "write scaling"; that is, no way to increase the number of writes beyond what a single Master can handle.
trans-unit.target: 对于 "传统 "复制,特别是使用 "基于语句的复制 "时,所有写到主站的数据都会应用到所有从站,并且它们会被连续重放。即使是多主站设置,所有的写入都会应用到所有的主站。因此,没有办法获得 "写扩展";也就是说,没有办法增加写的数量,超过单个Master可以处理的数量。

trans-unit.source: With 5.6 and especially 5.7 having a lot of ALTER ALGORITHM=INPLACE cases, check which ALTERs should be done which way.
trans-unit.target: 5.6特别是5.7有很多ALTER ALGORITHM=INPLACE的情况下,请检查哪些ALTER应该用哪种方式进行。

trans-unit.source: With XtraDB/InnoDB, TRUNCATE TABLE is slower if innodb_file_per_table=ON is set (the default since MariaDB 5.5). This is because TRUNCATE TABLE unlinks the underlying tablespace file, which can be an expensive operation. See MDEV-8069 for more details.
trans-unit.target: 使用XtraDB / InnoDB时，如果设置了innodb_file_per_table = ON（MariaDB 5.5之后的默认值），则 TRUNCATE TABLE 会变慢。这是因为 TRUNCATE TABLE 取消了基础表空间文件的链接，这可能是一项昂贵的操作。有关更多详细信息，请参见MDEV-8069。

trans-unit.source: With mysql_plugin while the server is offline.
trans-unit.target: 在服务器脱机时使用mysql_plugin。

trans-unit.source: With MariaDB 10.0 and newer you can use the SHUTDOWN command from any client.
trans-unit.target: 使用MariaDB 10.0和更高版本，您可以从任何客户端使用SHUTDOWN命令。

trans-unit.source: With EXTENDED, the entire table is read row by row and the checksum is calculated. This can be very slow for large tables.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EXTENDED ，可以逐行读取整个表并计算校验和。对于大型表，这可能非常慢。

trans-unit.source: With INSERT ... SELECT, you can quickly insert many rows into a table from one or more other tables. For example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 INSERT ... SELECT ，您可以将一个或多个其他表中的许多行快速插入到一个表中。例如：

trans-unit.source: With QUICK, the live table checksum is reported if it is available, or NULL otherwise. This is very fast. A live checksum is enabled by specifying the CHECKSUM=1 table option when you create the table; currently, this is supported only for Aria and MyISAM tables.
trans-unit.target: 使用 QUICK ，将报告活动表校验和（如果可用），否则报告 NULL 。这是非常快的。创建表时，通过指定 CHECKSUM=1 表选项来启用实时校验和；当前，仅Aria和MyISAM表支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: With SpiderForMySQL, the CREATE TABLE statement uses CONNECTION to define spider table variables whereas MariaDB uses COMMENT.
trans-unit.target: 对于 SpiderForMySQL ，CREATE TABLE语句使用 CONNECTION 定义蜘蛛表变量，而MariaDB使用 COMMENT 。

trans-unit.source: With docker stop, the container will be gracefully terminated: a SIGTERM signal will be sent to the mysqld process, and Docker will wait for the process to shutdown before returning the control to the shell. However, it is also possible to set a timeout, after which the process will be immediately killed with a SIGKILL. Or it is possible to immediately kill the process, with no timeout.
trans-unit.target: 使用 docker stop ，容器将被正常终止： SIGTERM 信号将被发送到 mysqld 进程，而Docker将等待该进程关闭，然后再将控件返回给Shell。但是，也可以设置一个超时，在此之后该进程将立即通过 SIGKILL 终止。或者有可能立即终止进程，而不会超时。

trans-unit.source: With innodb-encrypt-tables=ON, new InnoDB tables will be encrypted by default, using the key ID set in innodb_default_encryption_key_id (default 1). With innodb-encrypt-tables=FORCE enabled, it is not possible to manually bypass encryption when creating a table.
trans-unit.target: 当 innodb-encrypt-tables=ON 时，默认情况下将使用 innodb_default_encryption_key_id （默认值为1）中设置的密钥ID 对新的InnoDB表进行加密。与 innodb-encrypt-tables=FORCE 启用时，它创建表时是不可能的手动旁路加密。

trans-unit.source: With CONNECT version 1.04 (from MariaDB 10.1.6), another way to provide random access is to specify some columns to be indexed. This should be done only when the corresponding column of the source table is also indexed. This should be used for tables too large to be stored in memory and is similar to the remote indexing used by the MYSQL table type and by the FEDERATED engine.
trans-unit.target: 使用CONNECT版本1.04（来自MariaDB 10.1.6），提供随机访问的另一种方法是指定一些要建立索引的列。仅当源表的相应列也已建立索引时，才应执行此操作。这应该用于太大而无法存储在内存中的表，并且类似于MYSQL表类型和FEDERATED引擎使用的远程索引。

trans-unit.source: With CONNECT, MariaDB has one of the most advanced implementations of MED and NoSQL, without the need for complex additions to the SQL syntax (foreign tables are "normal" tables using the CONNECT engine).
trans-unit.target: 有了CONNECT,MariaDB拥有MED和NoSQL最先进的实现之一,而不需要在SQL语法中添加复杂的内容(使用CONNECT引擎,外表就是 "普通 "表)。

trans-unit.target: 通过数据库工作台,你可以:

trans-unit.source: With Galera, there is a moderate degree of write scaling.
trans-unit.target: 对于Galera,有一个适度的写入比例。

trans-unit.source: With INDEX(id), this suddenly becomes very efficient.
trans-unit.target: 有了INDEX(id),这突然变得非常高效。

trans-unit.source: With INSERT ... SELECT, you can quickly insert many rows into a table from one or more other tables.
trans-unit.target: 使用INSERT ...SELECT,您可以快速地从一个或多个其他表插入许多行到表中。

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB page compression, a page is only compressed when it is flushed to disk. This means that if you are monitoring InnoDB page compression via these status variables, then the status variables values will only get incremented when the dirty pages are flushed to disk, which does not necessarily happen immediately. For example:
trans-unit.target: 对于InnoDB页面压缩,只有当一个页面被刷新到磁盘时,它才会被压缩。这意味着,如果你通过这些状态变量来监控InnoDB页面压缩,那么状态变量的值只有在脏页被刷新到磁盘时才会增加,而这不一定会立即发生。比如说

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB page compression, compressed pages are immediately decompressed after being read from the tablespace file, and only uncompressed pages are stored in the buffer pool. In contrast, with InnoDB's COMPRESSED row format, compressed pages are decompressed immediately after they are read from the tablespace file, and both the uncompressed and compressed pages are stored in the buffer pool. This means that the COMPRESSED row format uses more space in the buffer pool than InnoDB page compression does.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB页面压缩时，从表空间文件中读取压缩的页面后，将立即对其进行解压缩，并且仅将未压缩的页面存储在缓冲池中。相比之下，使用InnoDB的 COMPRESSED 行格式，从表空间文件中读取压缩的页面后，它们立即被解压缩，并且未压缩的页面和压缩的页面都存储在缓冲池中。这意味着与InnoDB页面压缩相比， COMPRESSED 行格式在缓冲池中使用的空间更多。

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB page compression, multiple compression algorithms are supported. In contrast, with InnoDB's COMPRESSED row format, zlib is the only supported compression algorithm. This means that the COMPRESSED row format has less compression options than InnoDB page compression does.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB页面压缩，支持多种压缩算法。相反，对于InnoDB的 COMPRESSED 行格式， zlib 是唯一受支持的压缩算法。这意味着， COMPRESSED 行格式的压缩选项比InnoDB页压缩少。

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB page compression, pages are compressed just before being written to the tablespace file. In contrast, with InnoDB's COMPRESSED row format, pages are re-compressed immediately after any changes, and the compressed pages are stored in the buffer pool alongside the uncompressed pages. These changes are then occasionally flushed to disk. This means that the COMPRESSED row format re-compresses data more frequently than InnoDB page compression does.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB页面压缩，页面将在被写入表空间文件之前被压缩。相反，使用InnoDB的 COMPRESSED 行格式，在进行任何更改后立即重新压缩页面，并且将压缩的页面与未压缩的页面一起存储在缓冲池中。这些更改然后偶尔会刷新到磁盘。这意味着， COMPRESSED 行格式比InnoDB页压缩更频繁地重新压缩数据。

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB page compression, pages are compressed when they are flushed to disk. Therefore, it can be helpful to optimize the configuration of InnoDB's page flushing. See InnoDB Page Flushing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB页面压缩时，页面在刷新到磁盘时会被压缩。因此，优化InnoDB页面刷新的配置可能会有所帮助。有关更多信息，请参见InnoDB页面刷新。

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB tables using encryption, there are several cases where a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement can throw Error 1005, due to the InnoDB error 140, Wrong create options. For instance,
trans-unit.target: 在使用加密的InnoDB表的情况下，由于InnoDB错误140， Wrong create options ，在某些情况下 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句可能引发错误1005 。例如，

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB, the table rebuild will only reclaim unused space (i.e. the space previously used for deleted rows) if the innodb_file_per_table system variable is set to ON. If the system variable is OFF, then the space will not be reclaimed, but it will be-re-used for new data that's later added.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB，如果将 innodb_file_per_table 系统变量设置为 ON ，则表重建将仅回收未使用的空间（即以前用于已删除行的空间）。如果系统变量为 OFF ，则不会回收该空间，但会将其用于以后添加的新数据。

trans-unit.source: With InnoDB, users can see the following message as an error or warning:
trans-unit.target: 通过InnoDB,用户可以看到以下信息作为错误或警告。

trans-unit.source: With LIST COLUMNS, a row matches a partition if all row values are identical to the specified values. At most one partition can match the row.
trans-unit.target: 在使用LIST COLUMNS时,如果所有行的值都与指定的值相同,那么一行就会与一个分区相匹配。最多只有一个分区可以匹配该行。

trans-unit.source: With Linux distributions that use systemd, you need to set the environment variable in the service file, (systemd doesn't read from the /etc/environment file).
trans-unit.target: 对于使用systemd的 Linux发行版，您需要在服务文件中设置环境变量（systemd不会从/ etc / environment文件中读取）。

trans-unit.source: With MERGE, the view definition and the related portion of the statement referring to the view are merged. If TEMPTABLE is selected, the view results are stored in a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 使用MERGE,视图定义和引用该视图的语句的相关部分将被合并。如果选择 "TEMPTABLE",则将视图结果存储在临时表中。

trans-unit.source: With MariaDB it's very easy to copy tables between different MariaDB databases and different MariaDB servers. This works for tables created with the Archive, Aria, CSV, InnoDB, MyISAM, MERGE, and XtraDB engines.
trans-unit.target: 使用MariaDB，在不同的MariaDB数据库和不同的MariaDB服务器之间复制表非常容易。这适用于使用Archive，Aria，CSV，InnoDB，MyISAM，MERGE和XtraDB引擎创建的表。

trans-unit.source: With MariaDB, it is possible to upgrade from the MySQL 5.0 format without having to dump the tables.
trans-unit.target: 通过MariaDB,可以从MySQL 5.0格式升级,而不必转储表。

trans-unit.source: With Mroonga, you can have a CJK-ready full text search feature, and it is faster than the MyISAM and InnoDBfull text search for both updating and searching.
trans-unit.target: 使用Mroonga，您可以拥有支持CJK的全文本搜索功能，它比MyISAM和InnoDB 全文本搜索在更新和搜索方面都快。

trans-unit.source: With RANGE COLUMNS, a row matches a partition if all row values are less than specified values. The first partition that matches row values will be used.
trans-unit.target: 在使用RANGE COLUMNS时,如果所有的行值都小于指定的值,那么行就会匹配一个分区。匹配行值的第一个分区将被使用。

trans-unit.source: With Visual Studio 2017, use corresponding 32bit generator
trans-unit.target: 使用Visual Studio 2017,使用相应的32位生成器。

trans-unit.source: With Visual Studio 2019, pass -A Win32 parameter for CMake, like this
trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio 2019中,为CMake传递-A Win32参数,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: With WAN replication topology, cluster nodes can be located close to clients. Therefore all read & write operations will be super fast with the local node connection. The RTT related delay will be experienced only at commit time, and even then it can be generally accepted by end user, usually the kill-joy for end user experiences is the slow browsing response time, and read operations are as fast as they possibly can be.
trans-unit.target: 使用WAN复制拓扑，群集节点可以位于靠近客户端的位置。因此，通过本地节点连接，所有读取和写入操作都将非常快。与RTT相关的延迟将仅在提交时经历，并且即使那时它也可以被最终用户普遍接受，通常，最终用户体验的杀戮之旅是缓慢的浏览响应时间，并且读取操作尽可能快。是。

trans-unit.source: With a MariaDB for debug build, it can be enabled by a mysqld command line option:
trans-unit.target: 使用MariaDB for debug build，可以通过mysqld命令行选项启用它：

trans-unit.source: With a FOR clause, this statement sets the password for a specific account on the current server host. Only clients that have the UPDATE privilege for the mysql database can do this. The user value should be given in user_name@host_name format, where user_name and host_name are exactly as they are listed in the User and Host columns of the mysql.user table entry.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FOR 子句，此语句为当前服务器主机上的特定帐户设置密码。只有对 mysql 数据库具有 UPDATE 特权的客户端才能执行此操作。用户值应以 user_name@host_name 格式给出，其中 user_name 和 host_name 与 mysql.user 表条目的User和Host列中列出的名称完全相同。

trans-unit.source: With a high value for swappiness, you lose some RAM because the OS is trying to keep a lot of space free for future allocations (that MySQL is not likely to need).
trans-unit.target: 如果swappiness的值很高,你就会损失一些RAM,因为操作系统正试图为未来的分配保留大量的空闲空间(MySQL不可能需要)。

trans-unit.source: With a single argument, this function returns the date or datetime expression expr as a datetime value. With two arguments, it adds the time expression expr2 to the date or datetime expression expr1 and returns the result as a datetime value.
trans-unit.target: 使用单个参数，此函数将date或datetime表达式 expr 作为datetime值返回。它使用两个参数将时间表达式 expr2 添加到日期或日期时间表达式 expr1 并将结果作为日期时间值返回。

trans-unit.source: With a table "mytable" in database "test", you can compare the output with --flashback and without.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据库“ test”中的表“ mytable”，您可以将输出与 --flashback 和不使用--flashback进行比较。

trans-unit.source: With each slave MariaDB Server in your deployment, configure it to replicate data from the master server and start the replication process. Perform the following operations on each slave server, (that is, Server-2 through Server-4).
trans-unit.target: 对于部署中的每个从属MariaDB服务器，将其配置为从主服务器复制数据并开始复制过程。在每个从属服务器（即 Server-2 至 Server-4 ）上执行以下操作。

trans-unit.source: With earlier versions of the Mongo C Driver, the additional include directories and libraries will have to be specified manually when compiling.
trans-unit.target: 如果是早期版本的Mongo C驱动,编译时必须手动指定额外的包含目录和库。

trans-unit.source: With encryption you protect Data At Rest (see the Wikipedia article). That way, the database files are protected against unauthorized access.
trans-unit.target: 通过加密，您可以保护静态数据（请参阅Wikipedia文章）。这样，可以保护数据库文件免遭未经授权的访问。

trans-unit.source: With encryption you protect Data At Rest (see the Wikipedia article). That way, the database files are protected against unauthorized access.
trans-unit.target: 通过加密，您可以保护“静态数据”（请参阅Wikipedia文章）。这样，可以保护数据库文件免遭未经授权的访问。
