trans-unit.target: 在有了直方图的情况下,优化器可以选择以下的、更有效的方案。

trans-unit.source: With instant ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN, you can enjoy all the benefits of structured storage without the drawback of having to rebuild the table.
trans-unit.target: 使用即时 ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN ，您可以享受结构化存储的所有好处，而不必重建表。

trans-unit.source: With just its default column, a VIR table is almost equivalent to a SEQUENCE table. The syntax used is the main difference, for instance:
trans-unit.target: 仅使用其默认列，VIR表几乎等同于SEQUENCE表。使用的语法是主要区别，例如：

trans-unit.source: With more experience, additional UDFs can be easily written to support new needs.
trans-unit.target: 随着经验的增加,可以很容易地编写额外的UDF来支持新的需求。

trans-unit.source: With multiple domains in the UNTIL condition, each domain runs only up to and including the specified position, so it is possible for different domains to stop at different places in the binlog (each domain will resume from the stopped position when the slave is started the next time).
trans-unit.target: 在UNTIL条件下的多个域,每个域只运行到指定的位置(包括指定的位置),所以不同的域有可能在binlog中的不同位置停止(当下一次启动从属域时,每个域将从停止的位置恢复)。

trans-unit.source: With neither the extra index, nor 5.6, this 'solution' would belong in 'The Duds' because it would run in O(N*N) time.
trans-unit.target: 既没有额外的指数,也没有5.6,这个 "解决方案 "将属于 "Duds",因为它将在O(N*N)时间内运行。

trans-unit.source: With no FOR clause, this statement sets the password for the current user. Any client that has connected to the server using a non-anonymous account can change the password for that account.
trans-unit.target: 没有 FOR 子句，此语句设置当前用户的密码。使用非匿名帐户连接到服务器的任何客户端都可以更改该帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: With no options, myisamchk simply checks your table as the default operation.
trans-unit.target: 在没有选项的情况下,myisamchk只是作为默认操作检查你的表。

trans-unit.source: With non-transactional storage engines, if a BEFORE statement produces an error, the statement will not be executed. Statements that affect multiple rows will fail before inserting the current row.
trans-unit.target: 对于非事务性存储引擎,如果BEFORE语句产生错误,该语句将不会被执行。在插入当前行之前,影响多行的语句将失败。

trans-unit.source: With one non-InnoDB Staging table per Inserter, using an explicit LOCK TABLE avoids repeated implicit locks on each INSERT.
trans-unit.target: 每个Inserter有一个非InnoDB Staging表,使用显式LOCK TABLE可以避免每次INSERT上重复的隐式锁。

trans-unit.source: With openSUSE and SUSE, you can use the source-install command.
trans-unit.target: 对于openSUSE和SUSE,你可以使用source-install命令。

trans-unit.source: With partition engine this will display partition name like P#p0
trans-unit.target: 使用分区引擎,将显示分区名称,如P#p0。

trans-unit.source: With precision:
trans-unit.target: 准确地。

trans-unit.source: With respect to the allowed operations, the INPLACE algorithm supports a subset of the operations supported by the COPY algorithm, and it supports a superset of the operations supported by the NOCOPY algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 关于允许的操作， INPLACE 算法支持由支持的操作的一个子集 COPY 算法，它支持由支持的操作的超集 NOCOPY 算法。

trans-unit.source: With respect to the allowed operations, the INSTANT algorithm supports a subset of the operations supported by the NOCOPY algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 关于允许的操作， INSTANT 算法支持 NOCOPY 算法支持的部分操作。

trans-unit.source: With respect to the allowed operations, the NOCOPY algorithm supports a subset of the operations supported by the INPLACE algorithm, and it supports a superset of the operations supported by the INSTANT algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 关于允许的操作， NOCOPY 算法支持由支持的操作的一个子集 INPLACE 算法，它支持由支持的操作的超集 INSTANT 算法。

trans-unit.source: With roles, managing this is easy. For example, there could be a number of users assigned to a journalist role, with identical privileges. Changing the privileges for all the journalists is a matter of simply changing the role's privileges, while the individual user is still linked with any changes that take place.
trans-unit.target: 有了角色,管理起来就很容易了。例如,可能有许多用户被分配到一个记者角色,拥有相同的权限。改变所有记者的权限只是简单地改变角色的权限,而单个用户仍然与发生的任何变化相关联。

trans-unit.source: With some partitioning types, a partitioning expression is also required. A partitioning function is an SQL expression returning an integer or temporal value, used to determine which row will contain a given row. The partitioning expression is used for all reads and writes on involving the partitioned table, thus it should be fast.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些分区类型,还需要一个分区表达式。分区函数是一个SQL表达式,返回一个整数或时间值,用于确定哪一行将包含给定的行。分区表达式用于涉及分区表的所有读和写,因此它应该是快速的。

trans-unit.source: With strict mode not set (default in version <= MariaDB 10.2.3), MariaDB will automatically adjust invalid values, for example, truncating strings that are too long, or adjusting numeric values that are out of range, and produce a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置严格模式（版本<= MariaDB 10.2.3中的默认值），MariaDB将自动调整无效值，例如，截断太长的字符串或调整超出范围的数值，并产生警告。

trans-unit.source: With strict mode set (default from MariaDB 10.2.4), statements that modify tables (either transactional for STRICT_TRANS_TABLES or all for STRICT_ALL_TABLES) will fail, and an error will be returned instead. The IGNORE keyword can be used when strict mode is set to convert the error to a warning.
trans-unit.target: 设置严格模式（MariaDB 10.2.4中的默认设置）后，修改表的语句（对于 STRICT_TRANS_TABLES 是事务性的，对于 STRICT_ALL_TABLES 是全部事务的）将失败，而将返回错误。设置严格模式将错误转换为警告时，可以使用IGNORE关键字。

trans-unit.source: With strict_mode set:
trans-unit.target: 设置了strict_mode。

trans-unit.source: With strict_mode unset:
trans-unit.target: 严格模式未设置。

trans-unit.source: With swappiness = 0, the OS will probably crash rather than swap. I would rather have MariaDB limping than die. The latest recommendation is swappiness = 1. (2015)
trans-unit.target: 在swappiness=0的情况下,操作系统可能会崩溃,而不是交换。我宁可让MariaDB一瘸一拐,也不愿意死掉。最新的建议是swappiness=1。(2015)

trans-unit.source: With table partitioning, each partition is physically represented by a sub-table. Compared to standard partitioning, this brings the following features:
trans-unit.target: 采用表分区,每个分区在物理上由一个子表来表示。与标准分区相比,它具有以下特点:

trans-unit.source: With tables that the user creates, you can disable encryption by setting the aria_encrypt_tables system variable to OFF. Once this is set, MariaDB no longer encrypts new tables created with the Aria storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户创建的表，可以通过将 aria_encrypt_tables 系统变量设置为 OFF 来禁用加密。设置完后，MariaDB将不再加密使用Aria存储引擎创建的新表。

trans-unit.source: With tables that the user creates, you can enable encryption by setting the aria_encrypt_tables system variable to ON, then restart the Server. Once this is set, Aria automatically enables encryption on all tables you create after with the ROW_FORMAT table option set to PAGE.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户创建的表，可以通过将 aria_encrypt_tables 系统变量设置为 ON 来启用加密，然后重新启动服务器。设置此选项后，在 ROW_FORMAT table选项设置为 PAGE 的情况下，Aria会自动对您创建的所有表启用加密。

trans-unit.source: With tables that use automatically enabled encryption, one way to set the specific encryption key for the table is to use the innodb_default_encryption_key_id system variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: 对于使用自动启用的加密的表，设置表的特定加密密钥的一种方法是使用 innodb_default_encryption_key_id 系统变量。例如：

trans-unit.source: With tables that use manually enabled encryption, one way to set the specific encryption key for the table is to use the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option. For example:
trans-unit.target: 对于使用手动启用的加密的表，设置表的特定加密密钥的一种方法是使用 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项。例如：

trans-unit.source: With tablespaces, the minimum size is 10MB, the maximum varies depending on the InnoDB Page Size.
trans-unit.target: 对于表空间,最小的大小是10MB,最大的大小根据InnoDB页面大小的不同而不同。

trans-unit.source: With the 1.1.X version of MariaDB ColumnStore, there should be no versions of MariaDB Server or MySQL pre-installed on the OS before a MariaDB ColumnStore binary or RPM is installed on the system. If you have an installation of MariaDB server, uninstall it before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 在1.1.X版本的MariaDB ColumnStore中,在系统上安装MariaDB ColumnStore二进制或RPM之前,操作系统上应该没有预装MariaDB服务器或MySQL的版本。如果你已经安装了MariaDB服务器,请在继续之前卸载它。

trans-unit.source: With the 1.2.0 version of MariaDB ColumnStore, there should be no versions of MariaDB Server or MySQL pre-installed on the OS before a MariaDB ColumnStore binary or RPM is installed on the system. If you have an installation of MariaDB server, uninstall it before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 使用1.2.0版本的MariaDB ColumnStore,在系统上安装MariaDB ColumnStore二进制或RPM之前,操作系统上应该没有预装MariaDB服务器或MySQL的版本。如果你已经安装了MariaDB服务器,请在继续之前卸载它。

trans-unit.source: With the InnoDB storage engine, if you specify a non-zero value for the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE table option for the whole table, then the table will implicitly be created with the ROW_FORMAT table option set to COMPRESSED.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB存储引擎时，如果您为整个表的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 表选项指定了一个非零值，那么将隐式创建 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 COMPRESSED 的表。

trans-unit.source: With the InnoDB storage engine, if you specify a non-zero value for the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE table option for the whole table, then the table will implicitly be created with the ROW_FORMAT table option set to COMPRESSED. However, this does not happen if you just set the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE index option for one or more indexes in the table. The InnoDB storage engine ignores the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE index option. However, the SHOW CREATE TABLE statement may still report it for the index.
trans-unit.target: 使用InnoDB存储引擎时，如果您为整个表的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 表选项指定了一个非零值，那么将隐式创建 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 COMPRESSED 的表。但是，如果只为表中的一个或多个索引设置 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 索引选项，则不会发生这种情况。在InnoDB的存储引擎忽略 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 指数期权。但是， SHOW CREATE TABLE 语句可能仍会为索引报告它。

trans-unit.source: With the infinidb_local_query variable set to 0 (default with local PM Query ):
trans-unit.target: 将infinidb_local_query变量设置为0（使用本地PM Query的默认值）：

trans-unit.source: With the mysqld_safe--syslog option one can duplicate the messages to the system's syslog.
trans-unit.target: 使用mysqld_safe --syslog 选项，可以将消息复制到系统的syslog。

trans-unit.source: With the GLOBAL keyword, the statement sets the default transaction level globally for all subsequent sessions. Existing sessions are unaffected.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GLOBAL 关键字，该语句为所有后续会话全局设置默认事务级别。现有会话不受影响。

trans-unit.source: With the GLOBAL modifier, SHOW STATUS displays the status values for all connections to MariaDB. With SESSION, it displays the status values for the current connection. If no modifier is present, the default is SESSION. LOCAL is a synonym for SESSION. If you see a lot of 0 values, the reason is probably that you have used SHOW STATUS with a new connection instead of SHOW GLOBAL STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 使用 GLOBAL 修饰符， SHOW STATUS 显示与MariaDB的所有连接的状态值。使用 SESSION ，它将显示当前连接的状态值。如果不存在修饰符，则默认值为 SESSION 。 LOCAL 是 SESSION 的同义词。如果看到很多0值，则可能是因为您将 SHOW STATUS 与新的连接一起使用，而不是 SHOW GLOBAL STATUS 。

trans-unit.source: With the GLOBAL modifier, SHOW VARIABLES displays the values that are used for new connections to MariaDB. With SESSION, it displays the values that are in effect for the current connection. If no modifier is present, the default is SESSION. LOCAL is a synonym for SESSION. With a LIKE clause, the statement displays only rows for those variables with names that match the pattern. To obtain the row for a specific variable, use a LIKE clause as shown:
trans-unit.target: 使用 GLOBAL 修饰符， SHOW VARIABLES 显示用于与MariaDB的新连接的值。使用 SESSION ，它将显示当前连接有效的值。如果不存在修饰符，则默认值为 SESSION 。 LOCAL 是 SESSION 的同义词。使用 LIKE 子句，该语句仅显示名称与模式匹配的那些变量的行。要获取特定变量的行，请使用 LIKE 子句，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: With the IGNORE_BAD_TABLE_OPTIONS sql mode this behavior changes. Unknown attributes do not cause an error, they only result in a warning. And SHOW CREATE TABLE will not comment them out. This mode is implicitly enabled in the replication slave thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IGNORE_BAD_TABLE_OPTIONS sql模式，此行为会更改。未知属性不会导致错误，它们只会导致警告。并且SHOW CREATE TABLE不会将它们注释掉。在复制从属线程中隐式启用了此模式。

trans-unit.source: With the SESSION keyword, the statement sets the default transaction level for all subsequent transactions performed within the current session.
trans-unit.target: 该语句使用 SESSION 关键字为当前会话内执行的所有后续事务设置默认事务级别。

trans-unit.source: With the CDC Data Adapter installed you can configure it to stream data to MariaDB ColumnStore. This is done by copying the Columnstore.xml configuration file from one of the ColumnStore nodes to the MaxScale-1 server, where the CDC Data Adapter can use it.
trans-unit.target: 安装了CDC数据适配器后，您可以配置它以将数据流传输到MariaDB ColumnStore。通过将 Columnstore.xml 配置文件从ColumnStore节点之一复制到 MaxScale-1 服务器，CDC数据适配器可以在其中使用它来完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: With the Distributed option, MariaDB ColumnStore will distribute and install the packages automatically on each node. The user installs ColumnStore on Performance Module 1, then during the postConfigure step, ColumnStore will handle the rest.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用分布式选项,MariaDB ColumnStore将在每个节点上自动分发和安装包。用户在性能模块1上安装ColumnStore,然后在postConfigure步骤中,ColumnStore会处理剩下的部分。

trans-unit.source: With the Distributed option, MariaDB ColumnStore would distribute the packages across to the other nodes in the system and will install them automatically. MariaDB ColumnStore also supports a Distributed option for Multi-Node installs. With this option, the user can install the MariaDB ColumnStore on Performance Module #1 (pm1) and the postConfigure install script will distribute it to all the nodes in the system.
trans-unit.target: 使用分布式选项,MariaDB ColumnStore会将包分布到系统中的其他节点上,并自动安装。MariaDB ColumnStore还支持多节点安装的分布式选项。通过这个选项,用户可以在Performance Module #1 (pm1)上安装MariaDB ColumnStore,postConfigure安装脚本将把它分发到系统中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: With the FederatedX storage engine, there will be no local files for each table's data (such as .MYD). A foreign database will store the data that would normally be in this file. This will necessitate the use of MySQL client API to read, delete, update, insert this data. The data will have to be retrieve via an SQL call "SELECT * FROM users ". Then, to read this data, it will have to be retrieved via mysql_fetch_row one row at a time, then converted from the column in this select into the format that the handler expects.
trans-unit.target: 使用FederatedX存储引擎，每个表的数据都将没有本地文件（例如.MYD）。外部数据库将存储通常在此文件中的数据。这将需要使用MySQL客户端API读取，删除，更新，插入此数据。必须通过SQL调用“ SELECT * FROM users ” 来检索数据。然后，要读取此数据，必须一次通过 mysql_fetch_row 检索一行，然后从该选择列中将其转换为处理程序期望的格式。

trans-unit.source: With the GA version of MariaDB ColumnStore, there should be no versions of MariaDB Server or MySQL pre-installed on the OS before a MariaDB ColumnStore binary or RPM is installed on the system. If you have an installation of MariaDB server, uninstall it before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: 对于GA版的MariaDB ColumnStore,在系统上安装MariaDB ColumnStore二进制或RPM之前,操作系统上应该没有预装MariaDB服务器或MySQL的版本。如果你已经安装了MariaDB服务器,请在继续之前卸载它。

trans-unit.source: With the MariaDB server you can use CHECK TABLE, REPAIR TABLE and OPTIMIZE TABLE to do similar things.
trans-unit.target: 使用MariaDB服务器，您可以使用CHECK TABLE，REPAIR TABLE和OPTIMIZE TABLE进行类似的操作。

trans-unit.target: 有了上面的文件,到你的MariaDB源目录下执行。

trans-unit.source: With the command-line functionality, you can save time by scheduling routine data generation tasks.
trans-unit.target: 利用命令行功能,您可以通过调度常规数据生成任务来节省时间。

trans-unit.source: With the configuration so far, our sample deployment will streams these new tables from the MariaDB Serves to ColumnStore through the CDC Data Adapter running on MaxScale-1. We'll then configure the second MaxScale server to selectively route your application traffic for HTAP operations.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们的示例部署将通过在 MaxScale-1 上运行的CDC数据适配器将这些新表从MariaDB服务流式传输到ColumnStore 。然后，我们将配置第二个MaxScale服务器，以选择性地为HTAP操作路由您的应用程序流量。

trans-unit.source: With the data node or data nodes configured, you can set up the Spider node to use them. The Spider node is the MariaDB server that receives queries for the table, (in this case test.spider_example). It then uses the Spider storage engine to connect to the tables on the data nodes to retrieve data and return the result-set.
trans-unit.target: 配置了一个或多个数据节点后，您可以设置Spider节点以使用它们。Spider节点是MariaDB服务器，用于接收对该表的查询（在本例中为 test.spider_example ）。然后，它使用Spider存储引擎连接到数据节点上的表以检索数据并返回结果集。

trans-unit.source: With the data nodes set up and the Spider node configured for use, you can create the Spider table. The Spider table must have the same column definitions as the InnoDB tables on the data nodes. Spider is configured through table system variables passed to the COMMENT option.
trans-unit.target: 设置了数据节点并配置了Spider节点后，就可以创建Spider表。Spider表必须具有与数据节点上的InnoDB表相同的列定义。Spider是通过传递给 COMMENT 选项的表系统变量进行配置的。

trans-unit.source: With the default setting of innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog and the default isolation level, REPEATABLE READ, a method called gap locking is used. When InnoDB sets a shared or exclusive lock on a record, it's actually on the index record. Records will have an internal InnoDB index even if they don't have a unique index defined. At the same time, a lock is held on the gap before the index record, so that another transaction cannot insert a new index record in the gap between the record and the preceding record.
trans-unit.target: 用的默认设置innodb_locks_unsafe_for_binlog和默认隔离级别， REPEATABLE READ ，使用方法称为间隙锁定。当InnoDB在记录上设置共享锁或排他锁时，它实际上在索引记录上。记录将具有内部InnoDB索引，即使它们没有定义唯一索引也是如此。同时，在索引记录之前的间隙上保留了一个锁，因此另一个事务无法在该记录与先前记录之间的间隙中插入新的索引记录。

trans-unit.source: With the directories in place, create a sym-link named mariadb which points at the mariadb-XXX directory you are currently testing. When you want to switch to testing a different version, just update the sym-link.
trans-unit.target: 放置目录后，创建一个名为 mariadb 的符号链接，该链接指向您当前正在测试的 mariadb-XXX 目录。当您要切换到测试其他版本时，只需更新符号链接。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of adding an auto-increment column, this operation supports the non-locking strategy. This strategy can be explicitly chosen by setting the LOCK clause to NONE. When this strategy is used, all concurrent DML is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 除了添加自动增量列外，此操作支持非锁定策略。可以通过将 LOCK 子句设置为 NONE 来明确选择此策略。使用此策略时，将允许所有并发DML。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of variable-length columns (that is, VARBINARY, VARCHAR, BLOB and TEXT), rows in InnoDB have a maximum length of roughly half the page size for 4KB, 8KB, 16KB and 32KB page sizes.
trans-unit.target: 除了可变长度列（即VARBINARY，VARCHAR，BLOB和TEXT）外，对于4KB，8KB，16KB和32KB页面大小，InnoDB中的行最大长度约为页面大小的一半。

trans-unit.source: With the help of both the hardware and the OS, it is possible to have some of RAM in huge pages, of say 4MB (instead of 4KB). This leads to far fewer TLB entries, but it means the unit of paging is 4MB for such parts of RAM. Hence, huge pages tend to be non-pagable.
trans-unit.target: 在硬件和操作系统的帮助下,可以将部分RAM放在巨大的页面中,比如4MB(而不是4KB)。这导致TLB条目少得多,但这意味着分页的单位是4MB的这样部分RAM。因此,巨大的页面往往是不可分页的。

trans-unit.target: 将infinidb_local_query变量设置为0(默认为本地PM查询)。

trans-unit.source: With the infinidb_local_query variable set to 1 (default with local PM Query):
trans-unit.target: 将infinidb_local_query变量设置为1(默认为本地PM查询)。

trans-unit.source: With the introduction of group commit, MariaDB also introduced an enhanced storage engine API for COMMIT that allows engines to coordinate commit ordering and visibility with each other and with the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 通过引入组提交，MariaDB还为COMMIT引入了增强的存储引擎API，该API允许引擎相互协调提交顺序和可见性，并与二进制日志进行协调。

trans-unit.source: With the large number of special characters, care needs to be taken to properly escape characters. Two backslash characters, (one for the MariaDB parser, one for the regex library), are required to properly escape a character. For example:
trans-unit.target: 由于有大量的特殊字符,需要注意正确地转义字符。两个反斜杠字符(一个用于MariaDB解析器,一个用于regex库),是正确转义字符所需要的。例如,在MariaDB解析器中,有两个反斜杠字符(一个用于MariaDB解析器,一个用于regex库),以正确转义一个字符。

trans-unit.source: With the non-sharding techniques described here, terabyte(s) of data can be handled by a single machine. Tens of terabytes probably requires sharding.
trans-unit.target: 利用这里描述的非分区技术,单台机器就可以处理TB级的数据。数十兆字节的数据可能需要进行分片。

trans-unit.source: With the source repository cloned onto your system, you can start building MariaDB. Change into the new mariadb-server/ directory and run CMake to prepare the build.
trans-unit.target: 将源存储库克隆到您的系统后，即可开始构建MariaDB。转到新的 mariadb-server/ 目录，然后运行CMake以准备构建。

trans-unit.target: 将源码库克隆到你的系统上后,你就可以开始构建MariaDB了。运行CMake来读取MariaDB进行构建。

trans-unit.source: With the techniques described here, you may be able to achieve the following performance numbers. I say "may" because every data warehouse situation is different, and you may require performance-hurting deviations from what I describe here. I give multiple options for some aspects; these may cover some of your deviations.
trans-unit.target: 使用这里描述的技术,你可能会实现以下性能数字。我说 "可能 "是因为每个数据仓库的情况都是不同的,你可能需要与我在这里描述的有损性能的偏差。我为某些方面给出了多种选择;这些选择可能会覆盖你的一些偏差。

trans-unit.source: With the variables binlog_snapshot_file and binlog_snapshot_position, such provisioning can be done fully non-blocking on the master. Without them, it is necessary to get the binlog position under FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK; this can potentially stall the server for a long time, as it blocks new queries until all updates that have already started have finished.
trans-unit.target: 使用变量binlog_snapshot_file和binlog_snapshot_position，可以在主服务器上完全无阻塞地进行这种配置。没有它们，有必要在 FLUSH TABLES WITH READ LOCK 下获得binlog位置；这可能会导致服务器停滞很长时间，因为它会阻止新查询，直到所有已开始的更新完成为止。

trans-unit.source: With these changes done, you can restart MariaDB to activate TokuDB.
trans-unit.target: 完成这些改变后,你可以重新启动MariaDB来激活TokuDB。

trans-unit.source: With these improvements, the START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT statement was enhanced to ensure consistency between storage engines that support the new API. At the time of writing, the supporting engines are XtraDB and PBXT. In addition, the binary log, while not a storage engine as such, also supports the new API and can provide a binlog position consistent with storage engine transaction snapshots.
trans-unit.target: 通过这些改进，增强了 START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT 语句，以确保支持新API的存储引擎之间的一致性。在撰写本文时，支持引擎是XtraDB和PBXT。另外，二进制日志虽然不是存储引擎，但也支持新的API，并且可以提供与存储引擎事务快照一致的binlog位置。

trans-unit.source: With this approach it becomes easy to add/change/remove attributes, but this comes at a cost of added complexity in querying the data: in order to answer the simplest, select-star question of displaying actors and their current ratings one has to write outer joins:
trans-unit.target: 通过这种方法,添加/更改/删除属性变得很容易,但这是以增加查询数据的复杂性为代价的:为了回答最简单的、选择星级的问题,即显示演员和他们当前的评分,必须编写外部连接。

trans-unit.target: 有了这些信息,CONNECT就能使查询发送到远程数据源。

trans-unit.target: 有了这些信息,FederatedX就会构造一条SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: With this installation type, you have the option of install using rpm, deb or binary packages, which you can install with the standard tools yum, apt, zypper.
trans-unit.target: 使用这种安装类型,你可以选择使用rpm、deb或二进制包进行安装,你可以使用标准工具yum、apt、zypper进行安装。

trans-unit.source: With this mode unset, MariaDB truncates fractional seconds when changing precision to smaller. When set, MariaDB will round when converting to TIME, DATETIME and TIMESTAMP, and truncate when converting to DATE. Since MariaDB 10.4.1
trans-unit.target: 在未设置此模​​式的情况下，将精度更改为较小时，MariaDB将截断小数秒。设置后，MariaDB在转换为TIME，DATETIME和TIMESTAMP时将取整，而在转换为DATE时将截断。自MariaDB 10.4.1起

trans-unit.source: With this option an optional error log file is written which states truncated, saturated, and invalid values during the injection. If the command line parameter -ignore_malformed_csv is chosen, it also states which lines were ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项，将写入一个可选的错误日志文件，该文件在注入过程中指出截断，饱和和无效的值。如果选择了命令行参数-ignore_malformed_csv，它还将指出忽略了哪些行。

trans-unit.source: With this option set, the replication I/O thread will limit the rate of download. Since the I/O thread is often much faster to download events than the SQL thread is at applying them, an appropriate value for read_binlog_speed_limit may reduce load spikes on the master without much limit in the speed of the replication slave.
trans-unit.target: 设置此选项后，复制I / O线程将限制下载速率。由于I / O线程的下载事件通常比SQL线程在应用事件时下载事件快得多，因此read_binlog_speed_limit的适当值可以减少主服务器上的负载峰值，而对复制从服务器的速度没有太大的限制。

trans-unit.source: With transactional engines, triggers are executed in the same transaction as the statement that invoked them.
trans-unit.target: 在事务性引擎中,触发器与调用它们的语句在同一个事务中执行。

trans-unit.source: With user and group mapping, any PAM user or any PAM user in a given PAM group can be mapped to a specific MariaDB user account. However, due to the way PAM works, a PAM user with the same name as the mapped MariaDB user account must exist.
trans-unit.target: 通过用户和组的映射,任何PAM用户或给定的PAM组中的任何PAM用户都可以被映射到特定的MariaDB用户账户。但是,由于PAM的工作方式,必须存在一个与映射的MariaDB用户账户同名的PAM用户。

trans-unit.source: With user and group mapping, configuring PAM is done similar to how it is normally done with the pam authentication plugin. However, when configuring the PAM service, you will have to add an auth line for the pam_user_map PAM module to the service's PAM configuration file. For example:

trans-unit.source: With user and group mapping, creating users is done similar to how it is normally done with the pam authentication plugin. However, one major difference is that you will need to GRANT the PROXY privilege on the mapped user to the original user.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户和组映射，创建用户的过程与使用 pam 身份验证插件通常完成的过程类似。然而，一个主要的区别是，你将需要 GRANT 的 PROXY 上映射的用户原来的用户权限。

trans-unit.source: Within a stored program, the definition cannot refer to program parameters or local variables.
trans-unit.target: 在存储程序中,定义不能引用程序参数或局部变量。

trans-unit.source: Within a stored routine that is defined with the SQL SECURITY DEFINER characteristic, CURRENT_USER returns the routine's DEFINER value. This also affects a view defined within such a program, if the view definition contains a DEFINER value of CURRENT_USER.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 SQL SECURITY DEFINER 特性定义的存储例程中,CURRENT_USER 返回例程的 DEFINER 值。如果视图定义中包含了 CURRENT_USER 的 DEFINER 值,那么这也会影响到在这样一个程序中定义的视图。

trans-unit.source: Within a view definition, CURRENT_USER returns the view's DEFINER value by default. Before MySQL 5.1.12, and for views defined with the SQL SECURITY INVOKER characteristic, CURRENT_USER returns the account for the view's invoker. For information about user auditing within views, see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/account-activity-auditing.html.
trans-unit.target: 在视图定义中，CURRENT_USER默认情况下返回视图的DEFINER值。在MySQL 5.1.12之前，对于使用SQL SECURITY INVOKER特性定义的视图，CURRENT_USER返回该视图的调用者的帐户。有关视图内用户审核的信息，请参见http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/account-activity-auditing.html。

trans-unit.source: Within a view definition, CURRENT_USER returns the view's DEFINER value by default. Before MySQL 5.1.12, and for views defined with the SQL SECURITY INVOKER characteristic, CURRENT_USER returns the account for the view's invoker. For information about user auditing within views, see http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/account-activity-auditing.html.
trans-unit.target: 在视图定义中，CURRENT_USER默认返回视图的DEFINER值。在MySQL 5.1.12之前，对于使用SQL SECURITY INVOKER特性定义的视图，CURRENT_USER返回该视图的调用者的帐户。有关视图中用户审核的信息，请参见http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/en/account-activity-auditing.html。

trans-unit.source: Within the body of a stored routine (procedure or function) or a trigger, the value of LAST_INSERT_ID() changes the same way as for statements executed outside the body of these kinds of objects. The effect of a stored routine or trigger upon the value of LAST_INSERT_ID() that is seen by following statements depends on the kind of routine:
trans-unit.target: 在存储例程(存储过程或函数)或触发器的主体中,LAST_INSERT_ID()的值的变化方式与在这些类型的对象主体之外执行的语句相同。存储例程或触发器对LAST_INSERT_ID()值的影响取决于例程的种类。

trans-unit.source: Within the same base version (for example MySQL 5.5 -> MariaDB 5.5, MySQL 5.6 -> MariaDB 10.0 and MySQL 5.7 -> MariaDB 10.2) you can in most cases just uninstall MySQL and install MariaDB and you are good to go. There is no need to dump and restore databases. As with any upgrade, we recommend making a backup of your data beforehand.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的基本版本中（例如MySQL 5.5-> MariaDB 5.5，MySQL 5.6-> MariaDB 10.0和MySQL 5.7-> MariaDB 10.2），在大多数情况下，您只需卸载MySQL并安装MariaDB，您就可以开始了。无需转储和还原数据库。与任何升级一样，我们建议事先备份您的数据。

trans-unit.source: Without SQL_BUFFER_RESULT, the above query would not use a temporary table for the result set.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 SQL_BUFFER_RESULT ，上述查询将不会使用临时表作为结果集。

trans-unit.source: Without and with strict mode:
trans-unit.target: 没有和有严格的模式。

trans-unit.source: Without any SESSION or GLOBAL keyword, the statement sets the isolation level for the next (not started) transaction performed within the current session.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何 SESSION 或 GLOBAL 关键字，该语句将为当前会话中执行的下一个（未启动）事务设置隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Without any special characters, a regular expression match is true if the characters match. The match is case-insensitive, except in the case of BINARY strings.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何特殊字符,如果字符匹配,正则表达式匹配为真。匹配是不区分大小写的,除非是BINARY字符串。

trans-unit.source: Without connection pool or MariaDB thread pool, HaProxy and Spider have been protecting the tcp socket overflow without specific TCP tuning. In reality with a well tuned TCP stack or thread pool the curve should not decrease so abruptly to 0. Refer to the MariaDB Thread Pool to explore this feature.
trans-unit.target: 没有连接池或MariaDB线程池，HaProxy和Spider一直在保护tcp套接字溢出而无需进行特定的TCP调整。实际上，在调整良好的TCP堆栈或线程池的情况下，曲线不应突然减小到0。请参考MariaDB线程池以探索此功能。

trans-unit.source: Without detection or prevention of partial writes, the integrity of the database can be compromised after recovery.
trans-unit.target: 如果不检测或防止部分写入,恢复后数据库的完整性就会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: Without that extra index, you would need 5.6, which has the ability to create indexes for subqueries. This is indicated by <auto_key0> in the EXPLAIN. Even so, the performance is worse with the auto-generated index than with the manually generated one.
trans-unit.target: 没有额外的索引，您将需要5.6，它具有为子查询创建索引的能力。这由EXPLAIN中的<auto_key0>指示。即使这样，自动生成的索引的性能也比手动生成的索引差。

trans-unit.source: Without that, log entries will go to the main system log file, and low-severity logs may not be recorded at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果不这样做,日志条目将进入主系统日志文件,低严重性的日志可能根本不会被记录。

trans-unit.source: Without the FORCE INDEX option we would have 'Using where; Using temporary; Using filesort' in the 'Extra' column, which means that the optimizer would created a temporary table and sort it.
trans-unit.target: 没有FORCE INDEX选项，我们将拥有' Using where; Using temporary; Using filesort 在“额外”列中使用filesort，这意味着优化器将创建一个临时表并对其进行排序。

trans-unit.target: 对磁盘上的文件进行批量SQL格式化的向导。

trans-unit.target: 美妙的酒花,淡淡的酒精

trans-unit.source: Word boundaries
trans-unit.target: 词的界限

trans-unit.source: Word from the text of a column with a fulltext index. Words can appear multiple times in the table, once per DOC_ID and POSITION combination.
trans-unit.target: 带有全文索引的列文本中的单词。每个 DOC_ID 和 POSITION 组合中的单词可以在表中多次出现。

trans-unit.source: Word from the text of a newly added row. Words can appear multiple times in the table, once per DOC_ID and POSITION combination.
trans-unit.target: 新添加的行的文字中的单词。每个 DOC_ID 和 POSITION 组合中的单词可以在表中多次出现。

trans-unit.source: Words less than 4 characters in length (3 or less) will not be stored in the fulltext index. This value can be adjusted by changing the ft_min_word_length system variable (or, for InnoDB, innodb_ft_min_token_size).
trans-unit.target: 少于4个字符（3个或更少）的单词将不会存储在全文索引中。可以通过更改ft_min_word_length系统变量（或对于InnoDB，innodb_ft_min_token_size）来调整此值。

trans-unit.source: Words longer than 84 characters in length will also not be stored in the fulltext index. This values can be adjusted by changing the ft_max_word_length system variable (or, for InnoDB, innodb_ft_max_token_size).
trans-unit.target: 长度超过84个字符的单词也不会存储在全文索引中。可以通过更改ft_max_word_length系统变量（或对于InnoDB，innodb_ft_max_token_size）来调整此值。

trans-unit.source: Work began in earnest on the Maria storage engine but the plans quickly expanded and morphed and soon the developers were not just working on a storage engine, but on a complete branch of the MySQL database. Since the project was already called Maria, it made sense to call the whole database server MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 玛丽亚存储引擎的工作开始了,但计划很快就扩展和变形了,很快开发人员就不仅仅是在研究一个存储引擎,而是在研究一个完整的MySQL数据库分支。既然这个项目已经叫Maria了,那么把整个数据库服务器叫做MariaDB就很合理了。

trans-unit.source: Works like MODIFY COLUMN except that you can also change the name of the column. The column will be at the same place as the original column and all index on the column will be kept.
trans-unit.target: 除了可以更改列的名称外，其工作方式类似于“ MODIFY COLUMN 列”。该列将与原始列位于同一位置，并且将保留该列上的所有索引。

trans-unit.source: Works like in non group commit' but the thread doesn't do any real sync(). If aria_group_commit_interval is not zero, the sync() will be performed by a service thread with the given rate when needed (new LSN appears). If aria_group_commit_interval is zero, there will be no sync() calls.
trans-unit.target: 就像在 non group commit' 一样工作，但线程不执行任何实际的sync（）。如果aria_group_commit_interval不为零，则在需要时，服务线程将以给定的速率执行sync（）（出现新的LSN）。如果aria_group_commit_interval为零，则不会进行sync（）调用。

trans-unit.source: Works with --stop-file, print messages every sec seconds when mysqltest is waiting to remove the file (for buildbot) (also MTR_STOP_KEEP_ALIVE environment variable).
trans-unit.target: 与Works --stop-file ，打印邮件每隔秒时mysqltest正在等待删除该文件（buildbot）秒（也MTR_STOP_KEEP_ALIVE环境变量）。

trans-unit.target: 适用于以CSV(逗号分隔的值)格式存储的文件。
